description:

The space
Aplace Antwerp is located on a charming little square in the very center of Antwerp (fashion district area). Literally around the corner of everything you want to see in this beautifull city.

This suite has been completely renovated since december 2012. It is being decorated in a vintage style combined with a few new objects which quarantees you a warm and cosy room.

It has a small sitting corner with sofa, digital tv, a docking station, dvd-player, a shared kitchinette with Illy espresso machine, a perculator and a little fridge and a microwave. The bathroom has a walk-in / rainshower.


This suite is situated in the back of the building and is extremely cosy.

description:

The space

It is located 15 minutes walk to the historic city center, in a lively trendy, upcoming neighbourhood, with plenty of restaurants, cafés, art galleries, ... We'll be glad to advice you on the nice places in this area.

A spacious, completely new apartment, with all amenities : 2 bedrooms, each with a kingsize boxspring bed, 2 bathrooms, 2 terraces, 2 toilets, a spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, oven, dishwasher, Nespresso machine, etc, ...

description:
Do you enjoy authentic places with a lot of charm? Parquet flooring, high ceilings, many nice ornaments. The neighbourhood Zurenborg is a real gem. The square near the house 'Dageraadplaats' is packed with bars and restaurants. All generations enjoy the lively athomsphere, parents can enjoy the many terraces while kids are playing safely on the playground. This apartment has a small terrace. It is near the train station and very well connected with public transport to get to the centre of town.

The space
This apartment has one room with a double bunk bed. A big sofa in the living room can be used as a bed if necessary. The house was built in the beginning of the roaring twenties. The large room has a loggia, high ceilings, marble chimney and integrated mirrors. It is filled with wonderful decorative antique ornaments.

description:
Large bedroom in classic 1930s house. Kitchen, 2 bathrooms, terrace and garden for common use. Parks and free outdoor swimming pool nearby at 200 meters.
Minimum period of stay 14 days.
Bedroom is fully furnished, including mattress. Large and fully equipped bathroom for common use on the same floor. Ground floor: fully equipped kitchen for common use. You are welcome as well to enjoy garden and terrace on the ground floor. Tram stop to city centre (10 minutes) at 50 meters.

My house is too big for me currently to use the second floor and the entire first floor as well, so I am looking for students or professionals to rent these (furnished) spaces out to. Currently 4 people are living in the house. Most of us are young foreign professionals.

description:
The space
Apartment "Roscam" is a charming self catering guest apartment situated on the Vrijdagmarkt, a peaceful square in the fashion district area, right in the old city center of Antwerp.

A cosy living room (incl. double sofa bed), one comfortable bedroom with a double bed, a fully equipped kitchen (coffee, tea, boiler, microwave, toaster), and a bathroom with a shower.
The apartment is perfect for a couple and could host up to four people.

The flat is very cozy and warm with many windows and natural light surrounded by lots of museums, galleries, bars, restaurants and antiques shops. Everything you are looking for in Antwerp is there to be discovered!

Guest access
The apartment is on the first floor but there is no elevator.

description:
your entire, private groundfloor 2-bedroom apartment and garden

The space
We welcome you on the ground floor of our house, situated in a quiet residential area of Antwerp. We live near “Elixir d’Anvers” (a delicious liquor), near the cultural center De Singel and near Antwerp Expo. You can walk to the city center, take a tram or rent a city bike.
You have lots of space, making our house suitable for longer stays. We prefer stays of minimum 3 nights. You're welcome for 1 or 2 nights too, but we only take these short term stays max. 2 weeks in advance.
Our flat provides one double and one single room. You get to the single room through the double room, so we only accommodate for a single party of maximum three people.
You have your own bathroom with shower and toilet, a full blown kitchen, a very cosy living-room (the library) and a small dining-room. And ... your own private garden.

Big one-bedroom apartment with court yard. Living room, dining room, fully equiped kitchen with cupola, bathroom, bedroom, seperate toilet. Very sunny and cosy place in the centre of Antwerp. Close to the central station (5 min. walk) and the Roosevelplaats (bus and metro station).
Newly renovated apartment, retrostyle decorated.

description:
The space
Ahome. Away from home !
This bright fully furnished to modern conditions appartment is located in the Medieval centre of Antwerp. Ahome lies in the heart of the old city, the bubbling city centre of Antwerp. You have and find everything nearby.

www.ahome.be
+32 488 20 83 23

135,- Euro per night for 2 persons (1 bed)
25,- Euro per night per person extra (max. 2 extra persons)
It can sleep up to 4 people: a double bed in the bedroom and a comfortable sleeper couch for two persons in the living room.

description:
De slaapkamer bevind zich op de eerste verdieping van een sfeervol heren huis.

The space
Close to the city centre and central station in the artistic and multicultural neighbourhood Borgerhout a beautiful mansion (herenhuis) from 1905. Live in the grandeur of passed times and feel at home. Sleep in the comfortable double beds of the two large rooms. The two rooms share one big bathroom where a refreshing rainshower starts your day.

When you arrive I always take time to show you the house and give you a lot of suggestions what to do in Antwerp, where to drink or dine and where to go out.
In the morning your extensive breakfast is served in the cozy kitchen or outside in the garden. The house has free Wifi, cable TV and radio.

description:
When entering the apartment after a 3 floors climb of the stairs, you ‘ll feel like entering an oasis of peace. The place is blessed with natural light and looking outside you have a beautiful view overlooking the rooftops of the residential houses around and lots of greenery which is very calming and the wide view is very liberating. In winter, when trees are pale, you can see right through them and you have a beautiful view of the city and the river Escaut which runs just across the road...

The space
It’s amazing to watch the sunrise from the apartment and even more to go for a little walk next to the river and watch the sun rise above the skyline of Antwerp while enjoying the quiet of the morning.

description:
Well located in the vibrant 't Zuid of Antwerp

The space
Modern duplex in neighborhood "'t Zuid" of Antwerp. Right across there's a tram station which can bring you anywhere. Easy connection to central station. Food store on walking distance, just as bars and restaurants. Vibrant night life around the corner.

You'll have easy access to anywhere in the city. There's a bike station right across the street where you can rent bike for only 15 EUR for a week.

There's always something to do and you'll never need a car to go anywhere.

A couple can easily sleep in my bed but if you prefer two different sleeping facilities, there's also a comfortable couch where numerous people spent the night. Including myself.

If you let me know in advance when you are coming with more people, I can arrange and extra mattress or folding bed for their convince.

Guest access
Guests will have acces to the full apartment

Hannus is a over 100 years old ship, originally built as a sailing cargo vessel. Nowadays the ship is used as a cosy hostel for individual travellers and groups. The ship offers 24 beds in 10 cabins, most cabins have 2 beds, two cabins offer 4 beds. Each cabin has its own sink offering warm and cold water and a cv radiator.

description:
I moved to the south of Belgium: the Gaume region. It is also called the provence of Belgium; the traditional houses are built with yellowish loam stone. There is a microclimate here
I'm in the charming village of Fontenoille.
Near Chassepière , here every year is an international street theatre festival.
Bouillon and the Abbey of Orval are nearby.
You can go hiking, cycling, horseback riding, kayaking,...
I did not know that Belgium was so beautiful.
Welcome :-)

Comfortable room with queen-size bed, wardrobe, writing desk and chairs. Second private room with (pull-out) sofa available. Shared living room, kitchen, bathroom and roof terrace.
Generally, you'll be able to enjoy the entire apartment, as I spend most of my time abroad. Occasionally, I may spend Tuesday and/or Wednesday nights at the apartment.
New and located in a quiet street, close to public transport, 15 min walk from central train station, 30 min walk to city center.

description:
A spacious 19th century house located in the center of Antwerp.
You can enjoy the grandeur of the bél epoque with all the modern comfort of today.
The house has up to 5 individual bedrooms and can accomodate up to 12 adults.

We fall directly in love with this house the first moment we saw it.
Build in the end of the 19th century, you can almost grasp the different spirits of time that passed here. High ceilings, lots of lights and well conserved ornaments.
The house was totally renovated with repect to the original style of the house. It consists of 430 square meters divided over 4 floors. There are 5 spacious bedrooms with double beds. It is possible to foresee extra beds for children. Each floor has its own bathroom + toilet. The master bedroom has a private bathroom and library.

All house is available except the basement.

There will always be someone in the neighbourhood to help in case of needs.

Quiet neighbourhood

description:
Living abroad myself, I know how important it is to feel like home while abroad, especially when travelling with kids. The flat offers all the amenities for a quiet and cozy stay, both for couples or friends, and for families with young kids who perhaps want to stay a little longer. Thanks to its ideal location, everyone will find what they are looking for here: the bustling South, the historic center, and the lovely playground are all within walking distance. Enjoyment for both young and old!

The space
A beautiful, elegantly furnished two bedroom flat in the heart of Antwerp, ideally located very close to the trendy “South” or “Zuid”-neighbourhood. Bars & restaurants are within a 5 minutes walking distance and there is a supermarket further down the street. The center is also within walking distance but if desired, great public transport connections are available nearby. At the end of the street there is a city bike station to rent bicycles for short term.

description:
I moved to the south of Belgium: the Gaume region. It is also called the provence of Belgium; the traditional houses are built with yellowish loam stone. There is a microclimate here
I'm in the charming village of Fontenoille.
Near Chassepière , here every year is an international street theatre festival.
Bouillon and the Abbey of Orval are nearby.
You can go hiking, cycling, horseback riding, kayaking,...
I did not know that Belgium was so beautiful.
Welcome :-)

Other things to note

Loft in the city centre of Antwerp. Designed in art deco & vintage (60's-70's-80's). situated @ the 7th floor with an amazing view on the central station of Antwerp. I am always available for any questions or suggestions.

If you love culture, you're at the right place!

See you soon! :-)

The space
A loft fully designed with vintage furniture from the 60's,70's & 80's. A lot of natural daylight & very spacious. There is a wooden floor that gives u a warm feeling.

I can classify it as my house & my passion, I hope you will have the same experience after your visite.

The view from the loft is just AMAZING! That's why we don't need a Television...

Guest access
You can use the whole loft, everything is yours during your stay

Other things to note
Everyone is welcome!

description:
Modern apartment at the South, the most trendy and popular area of Antwerp city centre. Free Wifi available. The south ('t zuid) is known for its vividness, and almost feels like a little village inside the city.

The space
Spacious, high ceiling apartement in the middle of the south, the most trendy area of Antwerp city centre. This very bright and quiet apartment on the third (top) floor you reach by stairs and has an open living space with equipped kitchen with eg. combi-microwave oven, Nespresso coffeemachine and watercooker. (Nespresso cups, tea, milk and water for free). Further there is a Guest toilet with lavabo, seperate bedroom (boxspring bed) with ensuite bathroom with lavabo and rainshower. WIFI en flatscreen TV. Seperate room with washing machine.

Private ideal and idyllic one room appartment covering the full top floor of an ancient town house. Includes separate but private Bath room and toilet. Located in the popular South district in Antwerp known for and full of musea, bars, restos and easy access to highways whilst having free parking around the corner.

Full apartment at top floor of app. 50 square meters with double bed, tv, wifi, small kitchen including a small fridge, oven, microwave, 2 pit electric cooking place and running water. Separate and private bathroom and toilet.

One room studio in a family house ( familiy lives in the bottom floors) with (dedicated) bathroom and toilet. Access trough the central stair case of the house.

There is bathroom with a great shower: including lights, water jets and radio(!), and a bedroom on a high sleeper with a comfortable double bed.

We will make sure there are clean sheets, towels, toilet paper and coffee and tea.

This is a nice quiet room in a cute house in the city of Antwerp, near the famous Mas museum, the University, and in walking distance to the historical center.
The railwaystation is a 15 minutes walk, there is also bus 17 stopping at the railwaystation that brings you around our corner.

You get a key of the house so you are free to come in and go out as you like.

Our neigbourghoud is full of young people, there are café's, bars, restaurants... just around the corner.

We also can give you advice on where to go, maps...
Clean bedsheets and towels included.

description:
Our apartment lies in a quiet street, near to some cozy bars & good restaurants. It's the perfect base to explore our city and it's vivid nightlife or to go for some shopping.

The apartment is situated in Antwerp Historic Centre, 100 meters from the University, 3 minute walk from MEIR (the main shopping street in Antwerp); Grote Markt is distant only 400mt, 1 Km from the Station Central.
All major museums are within walking distance (Rubens house, MAS, Mode Museum etc).

Enjoy your stay :-)

The space
You'll get the key to your own private apartment which we will make your home during your stay.
It has it's own kitchen, bathroom and outdoor terrace.
If any questions: we live upstairs

Guest access
Since you have your own apartment, you'll have everything you need at your disposition.
If needed, you can use our washing machine.

description:
This house can only be 'rented' on an exchange basis. Only contact us if you are an airbnb host wanting to swap house.
Located 0.4 km from Antwerp Central Station and the nearest subway entrance, 0.2 km from the tram and buses. Brussels and Ghent are 45' from Bruges 1.5h, direct train. Direct train and bus connection to Brussels’ Airport (33').

The space
More than you renting our house, we are interested in a house swap. Contact us if you have a house in a city in Central Europe that can house five to six people.
The house is 19th century. At ground floor level there is an impressive entrance hall leading into interconnecting living room with many period features and original fireplace and equipped kitchen. The kitchen opens onto the green city garden.

The first floor has a master bedroom with king size bed. The window opens to two terraces that overlook the garden. In the front there is a home office/study/library on this level.

description:
Superfijne surfvan te huur voor 2 personen met veel opslagruimte. Surfplanken/klimgerief/snowboardgerief/... kan je op het dak leggen. Verder zijn er 3 grote vakken onder het bed waar je nog heel wat ruimte in kwijt kan, net zoals in de vele houten kastjes. De camper heeft een frigobox waar je eten & drinken fris in kan bewaren, een lavabo, portapotti (=toilet) en kookvuurtje. Je kan zowel binnen als buiten koken en eten dankzij de praktische indeling :-) douchen kan buiten met een douchezak

Een douchezak en douchegordijn is voorzien om buiten te douchen (bij de achterdeuren van de bus). Een handige stok is hiervoor voorzien, waar je ook was e.d. aan kan hangen. Twee stoeltjes en een campingtafel zijn ook voorzien.

Very cozy apartment located on a dead-end street in the peaceful Harmonie neighborhood. It is located in a very quiet building surrounded by trees and free of traffic sounds. The neighborhood consists of beautiful houses where a lot of young families found their homes. For us a warm home, for you a welcoming and peaceful stay.

The space
The apartment is situated on the second floor of a 2-apartment building in a quiet little street. The apartment is on the upper floor. You will enter the hall where you can find a toilet and a laundry room. On the right is the door to our desk which we keep closed for personal stuff.

description:
Ik ben verhuisd naar het zuiden van België : de Gaume streek. Het wordt ook wel de provence van België genoemd; de traditionele huizen zijn gebouwd met geelachtige leemsteen. Er heerst hier een microklimaat
Ik zit in het pachtig dorpje Fontenoille..
Vlakbij Chassepière , hier is ieder jaar een internationaal straattheater festival.
Bouillon en de abdij van Orval zijn vlakbij.
Je kan hier wandelen, fietsen, paardrijden, kajakken,...
Ik wist niet dat België zo mooi was.
Wees welkom :-)

Op een boogscheut van Antwerpen bieden wij onze gezellige airbnb "2600" aan. We hebben 3 slaapkamers voor 5 personen (kinderbed mogelijk), woonkamer, wifi, televisie,badkamer, keuken. Op wandelafstand kan je het openbaar vervoer nemen richting stad. Ook zijn er voldoende winkels in de buurt en restaurants. Parkeren mits gebruik van parkeerautomaat. De luchthaven van Antwerpen is vlakbij. Op enkele meters bij ons vandaan kan je een fiets huren en de stad verkennen. (URL HIDDEN)r

Guest access
Gasten hebben de volledige privé woning ter beschikking.

Other things to note
Achter de hoek is er een wassalon.
Fietsen kunnen vlakbij gehuurd worden om de stad te verkennen.
Het aanbieden van een factuur is niet mogelijk.
Parkeertarief vanaf 1 april 2019 : 2.50 euro per dag

description:
An amazing big and bright apartment in the heart of Antwerp.The apartment has just been completely renovated, it is situated 2 minutes walking distance from the Central train station, the largest famous zoo, diamond area and the new Elisabeth zaal. 10 minutes walking distance from the Meir ( main shopping street).
All public transports are a minute away! Around the corner you have a big supermarkt.

The space
The apartment has a big living room, fully equipped open kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a separated toilet.
It is all fully furnished and has a big flat screen smart TV

Guest access
City maps, wifi code and keys are handled by us upon arrival.
We are always accessible on mobile phone!

description:
Loft in carfree historical area with private garden (300m2). Living area (150 m2) and 4 bedrooms of which 3 with private bathroom. Next to one of the most famous restaurants in Antwerp, "the Jane" and close to the city center and various touristic interesting must see's. Like the most beautiful art nouveau street of Belgium, Brewery "The koninck", PAKT and zurenborg on walking distance. Private parking for 2 cars available and storage for bycicles. Good Wifi and cleaning lady 2 times a week.

The space
spacious living area and kitchen with all you can wish on the groundfloor. On the lower floor we have 4 bedrooms. 2 bedrooms with each a private bathroom ensuite. And 2 bedrooms who share one bathroom. 2 bathrooms have a big bad. Each bedroom has a tv. In the living room is a corner for the kids with all kinds of stuff to play. In the garden is a swing, a slide and a trampoline.

Guest access
there are 2 spaces available in the underground park

description:
ZaligInAntwerpen is a luxury holiday Home in the historic center of Antwerp.

The 16th century house has been completely renovated and can easily accomodate 10 people with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, a cosy living room and fully equipped kitchen and dining area. It is ideal for big families, groups of friends, colleagues, workshops, etc...

You stay in a quiet pittoresk street and yet only few steps of all hotspots in Antwerp: Groenplaats, Kloosterstraat, Fashion District, shoppingstreets,

The space
Because you have the whole house for yourself, you can spend quality time with your friends or family, share aperitifs, cooking and dining.
Both the cozy living with TV and gas fireplace on the 3rd floor as the kitchen and dining area in a cozy bistro atmosphere are exclusively for your group.

Guest access
You have the entire property exclusively at your disposal.

description:
Ground floor of my house: 1 bedroom, dining room with sofa, private kitchen, bathroom corner and private toilet, shared terrace. Possible 2 extra single beds at dining room or at office next to appartement. Multicultural, park, bio-shop, supermarket, bars, resto. 17 min. from Central station.

Ground floor with additional option to rent the yoga/dancestudio. It is also possible for larger groups to sleep in the yogastudio.

description:
Dit is het appartement waar je wil zijn tijdens je trip naar Antwerpen

Een super gezellige woonkamer vol met planten en authentieke details.

Een rustige slaapkamer met een groot en comfortabel bed.

Midden tussen alle leuke buurten en vlakbij de belangrijkste openbaar vervoer hubs.

The space
Ruim appartement met een mooie houten vloer, authentieke details, vol met planten en grote ramen

- WOONKAMER -
De ideale plek om te chillen. Laat overdag de zon lekker binnen schijnen. Doe ‘s avonds de gordijnen dicht, de sfeerlampen aan en creëer zo de ideale sfeer.

Speel een van de vele gezelschapsspellen of zet een elpee op (The Doors, The Smiths, The Rolling Stones, Iggy Pop, Lou Reed, Louis Armstrong, Supertramp, Roxy Music, Kraftwerk, The Beatles, Edith Piaf, …).

- KEUKEN -
Maak ‘s morgens een heerlijk kopje koffie en zet u aan de grote eettafel. De keuken is goed uitgerust als u graag wil

description:
This studio is unique as it has a garden, free coffee and tea facilities and it is located in a quiet street but within 5 min walking distance from the center. The area has some great places closeby for coffee, lunch, dinner or drinks.
You can park in the street for 2,70e per hour.

The space
The studio has a comfortable boxspring bed (160x200), a one person sleeping couch (80x204) and the kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, 4 pit induction cooking stove and electric oven. There is a shower and separate toilet too and cable tv. Sleeping places available for maximum 3 persons.

Guest access
The studio is in a building with other appartments on the ground floor with private entrance.

Other things to note
You can have breakfast for 7,50e per person, which includes; bread, croissant, butter, jam, cheese, ham, 2 eggs, orange juice, yoghurt, coffee and tea as much as you like.

description:
Sunny and spacious recently renovated apartment located near the famous restaurant 'The Jane'. It is situated in the MIPIM award nominated residential project called 'Het Groen Kwartier'. The project is the urban transformation of the former Military hospital of Antwerp. It is known for its combination of beautiful architecture, green environment, great restaurants, bars AND all this in a walking distance from the Antwerp city-center.

The space
The apartment offers the following amenities:
- 2 Large bedrooms: 1 with Kingsize double bed and 2nd with 2 separate bed
- Fully equipped kitchen (including a Nespresso coffee machine)
- Fully equipped bathroom (including a hairdryer)
- Small sunny balcony
- Fast Wifi
- Netflix

Guest access
The apartment will be completely yours during your stay.

Other things to note
In case of any special requests, please do not hesitate to reach out!

There is one double bed in the bedroom, shower and toilet in the bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, sink, microwave oven, regular oven and gas cooker. description:
This quiet, bijoux loft (65m2) is perfectly located; at 1’ from the 'Grote Markt', the City Hall, the Cathedral and the Scheldt river. You’ll be just a few steps away from great museums, art galleries, restaurants, bars, shops…

But be aware! There’s so much to explore —if only you manage to shut the door and leave your cosy nest behind. Can you?! ~;))

Museums:
2' DIVA - Diamonds
5' MoMu - Fashion
10' MAS - Antwerp history
15' MUHKA - Modern Art
20' FOMU - Photography
22’ Central Station

The space
‘Op Den Spieghel’ is a newly renovated, fully equipped rooftop aerie/loft with fantastic views out onto this beautiful city, often called the Manhattan of the 16th Century.

The building is secure and has a lift. Our small loft (65m2) includes a fully equipped kitchen, a dining/living area, a toilet, a bedroom with queen-sized boxspring bed (feather duvet) and en-suite bathroom with bath and shower.

description:

Features a really sunny terrace, a combined living/sleeping area, separate bathroom and kitchen.

COVID : the place gets cleaned from a-z prior to your arrival. Cleaning products (Dettol) at your disposal in case you prefer to rewipe certain surfaces before using them.

Located ON the roof, elevator to the 6th floor and then you need to take the stairs to reach the roof (7th floor).

The space
- 1 double bed with good mattress and slat.
- Kitchen : dishwasher, fridge, freezer, microwave, Senseo.
- Bathroom : shower, hairdryer
- Iron

House with old elements from 1927. Wooden floors, lot of light. Old bathtub. The house is east/ west orientated and we have morning light in the kitchen/ bathroom. The sleeping room has sunlight in morning.

Great choice of restaurants, bars, coffee shops and supermarket in the immediate surroundings. Great for couples, we have an extra sofa bed in the living room for 2 extra guests (couple).
A 10 min walk to the city center and free parking space around the corner.

description:
Simone's Kitchen Home Restaurant and B&B is a place to feel at home, where you can sleep well and eat organic balanced delicious home cooked meals.

Right in the centre of Antwerp, located in a quiet street, you will find a 100 year old house with renewed interior that contains a homely restaurant B&B, with home-style meals prepared by Simone, all healthy, balanced flavour journeys, friendly for everyone; environment and animal.

The space
Get a full-experience of this by coming to our B&B, where breakfast is served upon request dinner Wednesday through Saturday, and Sunday brunch is served from 10am-2pm.

The homely feel continues into our rooms, which are newly outfitted and refinished, with two beds which can be made up as singles (90 x 200cm), or as a double bed (180 x 200 cm), made up with 100% Egyptian cotton, 400 thread count bed linen, and an ensuite bathroom. Acoustic isolated floors, new sanitary, home feeling lighting, cradle to crad

description:
The apartment is located at the left bank of the river.

It is very easy to get to the center. You can go by tram or on foot.
Using the pedestrian tunnel to the center is a unique experience !
It takes a 10 minutes walk to the tunnel from the apartment.

One can easily take tram 3 for those who attend a concert or performance in the "Sportpaleis".

You will stay in a very cosy bedroom.
You will feel at home !

The space
A trendy cosy bedroom with a very comfortable Boxspring a stylisch miror and a modern white little table.

Guest access
The guests have acces to the kitchen and the garden.
When the hostess is at home, the guests are welcome in the livingroom.

description:
Most welcome to stay in our studio, located between the old centre of the city and 'het eilandje'. The studio is divided by a mezzanine floor, furnished with a double-sized bed, a sleeping couch, usable as of from 3 persons. A private bathroom and Wi-Fi are available. No kitchen incl.
The main shopping streets and fashion shops, tourist spots + a wide range of bars/restaurants are within walking distance. A 20' walk from the Central station and the Port House, 10' from the cathedral & the MAS.

The space
The studio its high ceilings are a remnant of the times when this building was used back in the time as a banana storage facility when they were unloaded from the boats in the nearby harbour.

Other things to note
- No kids under 16,
- No smoking allowed
- No pets allowed

description:
Beautifully renovated apartment on one of the main squares of Antwerp. Great location! Near the shopping streets. This area is famous for its weekend market. The apartment offers a stunning view towards the theater building. The historical center, the Rubens House, the Grote Markt, the Cathedral, the Botanical Garden and many more are all within a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Wine and dine just a few steps away. And for those who love a morning jog: the park is literally around the corner.

The space
You will have a nice living room, fully equipped kitchen, two separate bedrooms and nice bathroom with walk in shower for your use.

Both Saturday and Sunday there is a big market in front of the door.
Bars and restaurants, the main shopping street, the Rubens house and the Cathedral are all within a 5 min walk. And there is even the city park behind the corner.

description:
Located in the vibrant city centre of Antwerp, only 5 min walk from central station and main shopping street "Meir". This authentic charming house offers a great and hassle free way to discover Antwerp. You are free to use the curbside parkingplace in front of the house to park your car for the duration of your stay. From there you can easily enjoy Antwerp by foot or if you prefer by public transport which is just around the corner.

The space
A comfortable and convenient getaway for families or couple's with two beautifully renovated bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a cosy outdoor patio and a spacious living and dining room. Go for a nice Belgian beer, a great meal in one of the many restaurants close by, discover animals in the Antwerp Zoo, visit chinatown or stroll towards the historic city centre.

The guest will have access to all rooms. Besides the bedrooms, the house comes with a room with a desk that could be used

description:
Vanop deze zeer lichte penthouse op de 15de verdieping heb je een uniek zicht op Antwerpen en de ruime omgeving.
Ideaal voor als uitvalsbasis om Antwerpen te ontdekken. Op 10min ben je met het openbaar vervoer of de deelstep in het centrum.
Eveneens op 500m van Berchem station waar alle internationale en lokale treinen stoppen, zodat je niet met de auto hoeft te komen.

The space
Je beschikt over het volledige appartement van 90m2 met een terras van 80m2 in 3 windrichtingen (O-Z-W).
De woonkamer, zithoek en keuken zijn 1 open ruimte, dus je hebt een zeer ruimtelijk gevoel. De 3 dubbele schuifdeuren geven een zeer licht effect alsof in de lucht logeert.

Guest access
Alle ruimtes zijn vrij toegangelijk

Other things to note
Je moet wel 1 verdiep de trap nemen.
De lift gaat tot de 14de verdieping, de penthouse bevindt zich op de 15de verdieping

description: This charming house we love has 3 bedrooms (3 beds)and sleeps comfortably 6 people. It has one big bathroom and separate toilet. The atmosphere in the house will make you feel right at home. So will the neighbourhood, it is the place to be in Antwerp with the brewery on the corner and great places to eat steps away from the front door. There are many cultural hot spot to discover, and the city center is only a 10 min bike ride away. City bikes are very close. We hope you will love it like we do!

description:
Very nice one bedroom appartment in the cosiest part of Antwerp: South. Next to many restaurants, bars, the river Schelde. City bikes around the corner, tram, busstops. The apartment is ground floor, so very easy access for all ages and with heavy suitcases or bikes. Completely equipped also with free Netflix.

Guest access
The apartment is located in the nice South part of Antwerp. You find many restaurants, bars and shops within walking distance.
City bikes (www.velo-antwerpen .be) are next to the door. You can buy a day or weekpass online., the easiest and fastest way to discover the entire city.
Paid parking in the street or large paid underground parking next door.
Tramstop is 9min walk.

description:
Perfect gelegen privé duplex studio in een historisch gebouw in het hartje van het oude Antwerpen. Studio ligt op de 2de verdieping.
Vlakbij de kathedraal, het Hendrik Conscienceplein, de Meir, de Wilde Zee, de Groenplaats, de Boerentoren, gezellige restaurantjes - eetgelegenheden voor ontbijt - lunch - diner, toffe cafés ... kortom the place to be :-)
Betalend parkeren om de hoek, tram stopt voor de deur, Centraal Station 20min wandelen, 10min met de tram

The space
Er is heel veel licht door de grote ramen. De studio heeft een groot bed 180X200, een gezellige sofa, keuken met kookgerief en ijskast, badkamer met douche en toilet, eethoek en dressing.
* De ruimte is volledig open.
* WYSIWYG

Guest access
Airco - wifi - ijskast - bedlinnen - handdoeken - keukenhanddoeken

Other things to note
Het bed is te bereiken met een laddertje.

Leuke studio in een gerenoveerd herenhuis voor 2 personen naast Park Spoor Noord en op wandelafstand van het Sportpaleis. Zowel het historisch centrum als het hippe Eilandje zijn vlot bereikbaar te voet of met het openbaar vervoer. Ideaal om de stad te leren kennen!

Een oase van licht, een heel gezellig plekje in hartje Antwerpen dichtbij het Rubenshuis en met zicht op het Theaterplein.

description:
This appartement is located just outside the city (Antwerp). The street is the second oldest street (105 yrs old) in Antwerp which makes it one of the most beautiful ones :) ! There are, beside a little garden, three big parks just around the corner with beautiful walks, a castle and an outdoor museum.

There's a small grocery shop across the street, a bar, some restaurants, a pharmacist and some others stores like a bakery, a butchery, ... Parking in the area is free !

description:
Super cosy renovated design apartment at few steps from 'Koninklijk Museum voor Schone Kunsten'.
Ideally situated in a quiet street in the middle of Zuid 'the place to be ', with the vibrant Marnix and Museum Square, with their trendy bars and restaurants, around the corner. Walking distance from the fashion district and the historic center.
Supermarkets, public transport and shops at 50 m.
Parking possible atparking 'Steendok' or 'kooldok'

The space
The apartment consists of a living room with fully equipped kitchen (all amenities) a bedroom with a double bed and ensuite terrace, walk in shower and separate toilet.

no smoking in the entire apartment

A hospitable home in a new city! Put one step in our carefully renovated city house and experience the gentle calm of our warm home. Full access

description:
"Pagadder Flat"

This quiet, charming apartment (80 m2) is located in the historical city center just a few steps away from great restaurants and shops, the Cathedral and the “Grote Markt”.

The space
The apartment

The “Pagadder Flat”’ is a renovated, fully equipped and sunny apartment with fantastic view onto the “Pagadder Tower” and the backside of the beautiful historical 16th century guildhalls of the “Grote Markt”.

An elevator brings you to the 2nd floor (entrance, toilet, dinner/living room, kitchen). Inside the apartment are stairs to bedroom/bathroom and the attic room. The facility includes on the first floor a dining/living area with integrated and fully equipped kitchen, a toilet, a storage area. The bedroom on the second floor has an integrated bathroom with bath and shower, separate dressing. There is also an attic room. The apartment is located at the backside of the building so you're protected from urban noise.

description:
Located in Antwerp South, near main roads and a huge free parking lot. Very accessible via public transport. The 135 square meters provides you with very light rooms: you look out on green both along the back and along the front of the mansion. As a result, there is no insight, which is a special feature in the city. This apartment on the 2nd floor is luxuriously furnished with Siemens appliances, rain shower, Miele washing machine, Auping box spring,...

The space
The apartment in this old mansion of 1892 was completely renovated while maintaining its authentic original features such as the marble fireplaces, the 45 square meters original parquet floor in living room and lounge, the wooden doors with glass and the cement tiles in kitchen and hallway. The terrace at the back gives way to spacious, beautiful and peaceful gardens of immense mansions that once housed the French and Congolese embassy. You can sit here on a bench; smoking is permitted here.

description:
Our house is located near the centre of Antwerp, in a busy multi-culti neighborhood, a ten min walk from the central train station. Shops, bakeries, restaurants, bars, and public transport are all within walking distance.
The house is on a car-free courtyard, and next to a hidden park. My friends tell me they feel like they're in nature when they're in my garden, it's so peaceful.
If you come with kids, be aware that the second bedroom has a steep staircase.
Ideal for four, possibly for more.

The space
There's lots of natural light, and hardwood floors in all the rooms and living space. The house was saved from demolition because someone went on a hunger strike, and it is now in the only original row of houses on the square. It was built towards the end of the 19th century, and continuously maintained and renovated.

Our penthouse is a calm and bright oasis in the city, you can enjoy the sun all day long on our 2 big terraces from which you can see Antwerp’s typical landmarks: the Cathedral, Central Station, Zaha Hadid's Havenhuis and the MAS.

It’s a 10 minute walk from the central station, a 15 minute walk to the central shoppingstreet The Meir. Close to all kinds of shops, restaurants, bars, and public transportation located in a vibrant multicultural area. Private parking space in the building.

The space
The apartment (110m2) itself consists of a bright open living room looking out on our 2 terraces (75m2), and an open fully equipped kitchen. We have 2 bedrooms, both looking out on our terraces. A bathroom with bath and a separate toilet. We are very excited about the renovation of our terraces in March.

The space

It has a living room with 45 inch tv, cozy dining room with fully equipped open-plan kitchen with washer/dryer, a sunny and spacious bedroom with Queen size bed, and a bathroom with shower. The living room also features a comfortable 2-person sofa bed. Speedy WiFi is included.

The apartment is fully equipped and is suitable for short and long stays (expats).

Guest access
The entire apartment is available

description:
With its beautiful ceiling paintings and authentic columns, it gives an impression of how the railway management lived here more than a hundred years ago. Nowadays the house consists of two connected living areas, with a dining room, kitchen, study and terrace. There are also two more bathrooms and a outdoor terrace on the higher floor

The space
Living in Maison Du Gard is living in a house that exudes history and past. Immerse yourself in refined architecture and imagine yourself an aristocrat in the 19th century. When you step outside you are immediately at Parkspoor Noord, less than a 2-minute walk away, take the tram, metro or bus to the city center.

description:
Sunny one bedroom partment in the south of Antwerp, on the first floor of a small apatment block. Located on the quay with a view of the Schelde and within walking distance of the historicalcenter. Close to lots of nice restaurants

The space
A few years ago I bought a house on the quay with a view of the Schelde.
The house is divided into 3 apartments. That was useful because at that time I had two daughters at home. The top apartment needs a lot of renovation and if everything goes well the works will start summer of 2019.
Meanwhile, the first floor apartment is already equipped with a new kitchen and a renovated bathroom.
My daughter went to live with her boyfriend a few weeks ago, so now I have available an apartment until the summer.
My experience with Airbnb is limited to using it until now. But I like receiving peolple and guiding them in Antwerp. Antwerp is a very nice city and there is always something to experince

Guest access

description:
The Nomad's lounge breaths Eastern charm in a historical setting. It is located in one of Antwerps oldest protected town houses. The room combines historical elements like high ceilings and stained glass windows, with modern comfort, hotel beds and a stylish tadelakt bathroom. Perfect downtown location, ideal for discovering the city on foot or by bike.
Free bagagelockers available, you can drop off your bags before check in and go discover the city!

The space
We personally restored this historical space, which is part of a protected house that originally dates back to 1503. We tried to pay attention to the historical perspective, and give it a unique contemporary touch as well, using ecological building materials. Hope you like it!

Guest access
The room has a fully private bathroom and toilet. A kitchen is not available.

Other things to note
There´s a few great painters living on the upper floors of this house.

I rent my cozy flat which is between modern Markgrave and vibrant Kiel.

The space
Your spacious private sleeping room is all yours and you share kitchen, terrace, bathroom-wc with me.

We have been working over 20 years in hospitality industry and because of this we know what guests are looking for: a nice, modern and clean flat, in the centre of the city, nearby lots and good restaurants, shopping possibilities and points of interest.If you want to cook for yourself, there is a Supermarkt (Delhaize) at 3 minutes’ walk from our flat.

The space
In our flat you will find a comfy bed room with satin sheets and en suite bathroom with nice smelling soap and new towels. The kitchen is very well equipped with all modern appliances (oven, fridge, dish washer, mixer, toaster, Senseo Coffee ...) and of course nice cutlery, pots and pans. In the bright living room you will find a 43’ flat screen TV with a Netflix connection. description:
Light apartement in the trendy 't Zuid area

The space
Nice apartement in the middle of the vibrant south of Antwerp. Close to restaurants, bars, museums and public transportation.
The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, living area, 1 bedroom and 1 (guest) bedroom with a sofa bed. Bathroom with bath and sink. There is the possibility to do laundry. The apartement is located in a quiet street.

description:
Ruime en smaakvol ingerichte studio met veel licht. Er is zijdelings Scheldezicht. De ruimte is gelegen op de bovenste verdieping van een woonhuis, er zijn dus wel wat trappen.
Er is een aparte badkamer met douche, lavabo en toilet één verdieping lager.

The space
Leuke studio met grote slaapkamer. Er is een ingerichte keuken. De badkamer met douche en toilet is op een lagere verdieping. De badkamer wordt enkel gebruikt door gasten.

Guest access
In het huis beschik je over een eigen studio, een eigen badkamer met toilet.
De gang is gemeenschappelijk.

Other things to note
Wij mikken op een rustig publiek, aangezien we ook zelf in het huis wonen en nette, kunstminnende personen zijn.

1 bedroom (double bed).
Ideal for citytrip or longer stay.
3 supermarkets, transport ,parks ,restaurants, bars at your doorstep. Quite place within the energy of the city.

description:
In the middle of the historic city, near Groenplaats, our famous Cathedral, Market square, fashion district, Kloosterstraat (antiques), restaurants and local pubs.

A fully decorated apartment with 2 separate bedrooms, well equipped kitchen, bathroom with walk-in shower, separate toilet, cosy livingroom with TV.

We will provide your self check-in codes upfront.
When apartment is ready before 16h, we will provide a message.

The space
The apartment is located at the 'Vrijdagmarkt'; a folksy and very cosy local square with terraces.

We offer free coffee, tea, milk and sugar..
Bed- and bad-linen included.

You look at the Vrijdagmarkt en the Plantin Moretus museum - world heritage!

All restaurants, local bars and shops at your fingertips!

Guest access

description:
Welcome to enjoy the beautiful view this studio offers on the park of Antwerp!

The space
This central situated studio,who has been totally renovated in 2018/2019,has a fully eguipped kitchen.
On the balcony you can breath the vibes that Antwerp offers.A fresh shower or bath and there you are ready to visit the city! I am sure you will totally relax in the cozy bed that’s foreseen in this one room studio.Sunset or sunrise view from the double bed (max.2pers.)is the best way to start or to end the day with!

description:
Looking for a homefeeling apartment on the best location in Antwerp? Look no further.. This is it! You will stay on the Vogeltjesmarkt (citycenter) in a historical building with an amazing view over the city with a very large bathroom. More than enough space for 4 people.

Also don't worry about taxi fares, you will find everything in walking distance (also there is lots of public transport)

Walking distance:
central station
shoppingstreet
botanical garden
zoo
kathedral
old city

The space
Volledig appartement ter beschikking, badkamer (bad/douche), slaapkamer.
Alles meubels en dergelijke zijn nieuw. Volledig gerenoveerd en zalig om een nachtje of eventueel langer te verblijven. Ook is er sprake van wifi, tv, zalig uitzicht over het Theaterplein, kathedraal, vogeltjesmarkt.

Guest access
Discover the historic city Antwerp from the elegant Hotel Sleep-inn. Located in City next to the Park

description:
SUNNY SIDE UP!
Welcome to the world of wonder by Lot and Bert!
This eclectically decorated AIRB&B is located in the immediate environment of Antwerp City.
Furniture and scenery in a very quirky own style will certainly cheer up your day..!
Colorful objects from the seventies love to stand here, next to art-deco pieces of furniture,
all this will bring you directly in a good mood ..!
Next to a kitchen and bathroom, you’ll find a children’s play corner,books and movies, and a little garden.

you are staying in the ground floorapartment of our house, with a separate entrance. it has a separate bedroom with a double bed, the bookshelfs in the livingroom can also easily transform in one double or two single beds.If you are traveling with small children, we have a babybed ,a chair, toys, ..You can use the kitchen to prepare a meal (there is a supermarket across the street).You have your own bathroom where you can take a shower. description:
Situated in the historic centre of Antwerp. The house dates back to the 16th century and is full of character. Located near to restaurants, pubs, museums and pubs. Especially the museum of fashion and all the fashion industry is in the vicinity.
The street itself is very calm and quiet.
Price per night for 1 guest is €40 and for two guests €60.

The space
The place is full of character. The guests can enjoy their room, the bathroom.

Other things to note
The entire Antwerp city centre is a low emission zone. Those who intend to come by car should check if their car is allowed to enter the LEZ (please check on https://lez.antwerpen.be/?Taal=EN).

An amazing big and bright apartment in the heart of Antwerp.The apartment has just been completely renovated, it is situated 2 minutes walking distance from the Central train station, the largest famous zoo, diamond area ,Elisabethzaal and the new amazing chocolate museum. 10 minutes walking distance from the Meir ( main shopping street).
All public transports are a minute away! Around the corner you have a big supermarket.

The space
The apartment has a big living room, fully equipped open kitchen, 2 bedrooms,a big comfy couch which can easily be transformed to an extra big one person bed, a bathroom and a separated toilet.
It is all fully furnished and has a big flat screen smart TV

description:
Very bright 140m2 loft in the centre of Antwerp.
The space is an art/architecture space as well as a living space, so we rent it as an entire house & also for shoots etc.
The bedroom, bathroom and dressing are designed as a compact glass volume in order to give the living room/kitchen a very open feeling.
The whole loft bathes in light, as there are 10 big windows and a huge sliding door towards the 15m2 terrace.
There is a nice common courtyard.

Vanuit de woning sta je op enkele minuten wandelen op de Grote Markt, bij de kathedraal of het MAS. De woning is super rustig gelegen aan een idyllisch stadspleintje, en maakt van je verblijf in Antwerpen een bijzondere ervaring! Opgelet, dit is geen partyhouse, hou rekening met de buren, geen geluidsoverlast 's nachts!

The space
Op het gelijkvloers vind je de woonkamer met open keuken en een eerste toilet. Charming and spacious apartment with sunny terrace in a lively neighborhood, near the central station.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor, accessible by a long straight staircase. You then enter through a hallway that gives access to the kitchen and living areas. The kitchen and dining room both have a view of the terrace, and are therefore very light spaces. The kitchen is fully equipped.

In a bustling neighbourhood full of shops, restaurants, cafés and magnificent sightseeing you will find yourself ideally situated in our appartement.

We offer 2 spacious rooms. 1 with 2 single beds and 1 with a double bed and a bunk bed. In case of 8 people we also have a double sleeping couch.
All mattressess are new and linens are hotel quality.
In case of 8 people please contact us to provide you with all necessities.

The space
Appartement located in the back of a city garden. Big spacious and light living room, 2 spacious bedrooms.

Guest access
The flat is accessible with a key that is made available through a key cabinet. As parking in the neighbourhood is difficult and very expensive, we recommend coming by public transport. Metro/tram and bus (Groenplaats) stop is at 3 min walking distance. For more information, please check the website slimn

description:
Cozy and modern apartment, full of natural light.
It is located at the top floor (3rd) of a recently renovated building, only 5' walk from the Central Station.

Perfectly situated to explore the city of Antwerp either by foot or by public transport.

The space
A fully equipped apartment close to the center of Antwerp. It has a cozy bedroom -- perfect to rest after a long day, a fully operational kitchen with all necessary appliances to make coffee & cook including a dishwasher and a TV connected to Netflix, YouTube etc.

This apartment is the one I live in when in Antwerp. I live between Belgium and Greece, and it felt like a nice opportunity to share my apartment when I am not here.

That means that since this space is mine, it is also made full of love. I am a jewelry designer with a soft spot for interiors, so I've put my heart into creating a cozy space for me and now for you too!

description:
Een charmante woning met privé tuin!

Je verblijft in een moderne, praktische dublex met ingerichte keuken die zich bevindt op gelijkvloers met vaatwasser, inductie ,microgolf , waterkoker , koffieapparaat , frigo en nodige materialen om te koken . Op gelijkvloer is er nog een teras gedeelte waar je nog kan eten met het Gezicht naar de tuin toe .Er is nog een badkamer met 1 bad , 2 lavabo, regendouche op eerste verdiep en nog een slaapkamer met 1 lege kast .
Plaatst voor 2 mensen en mss1 kind .

The space
Woning en tuin

Other things to note
Aub schoenen uitdoen en de woning netjes verlaten zoals u had ontvangen .

description:

De kamer beschikt over: Nespresso, koelkast, TV en WIFi en is gelegen aan de tuinzijde. Je kan gratis parkeren op de oprit. Vlakbij halte bus 21 naar Antwerpen Centrum en stations A'pen.-Centraal en A'pen-Berchem. Middelheimpark en Universiteit Campus Groenenborger vlakbij. Verhuur e-steps, fietsen en scooters in de wijk.

The space
Mooie en ruime benedenverdieping in een groot en licht huis met grote, verzorgde tuin met terras. Je bent met de bus in 20 minuten in het centrum van Antwerpen.
Gratis parkeren op de oprit van het huis.

Guest access

cozy, industrial loft styled open duplex with two bedrooms, bathroom, separate guest toilet and laundry room and a small terras. you will be located in the heart of the city right in the middle of the most famous shopping streets, this means that during daytime the street is crowed with shoppers but at night it is very quiet

description:
This apartment is perfectly located in the heart of the historical town. There are plenty of restaurants, bars, shops, markets and musea just around the corner. Please take a look at my profile and discover all my other apartments! I’m looking forward to host and meet you in Antwerp!

The space
This apartment is located on the 4th floor of a small and quiet building in the middle of the historical town.

It consists of a cosy living area with a big comfy couch. Digital television (smart TV) is available as well as a dvd-player and of course free WiFi.
Further on you will find the well-equipped kitchen with electrical cooking fire, fridge, microwave, water cooker and Nespresso coffee machine. Next to the kitchen you’ll find the bedroom. It has a queen sized boxspring bed and storage room.
In the bathroom you’ll find a bath/shower-combination, toilet and washing sink.

Fresh sheets and towels are always being provided for you.

description:
The India Yellow Studio is located at the third floor of the building and is decorated by Stekkie Amsterdam. The studio has everything you need; a living space with flatscreen TV, a separate sleeping area with a double size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a separate bathroom with shower and sink, a separate toilet and a big roof terrace!

The space
You will enter the building with a code and get your key out of a locker in the hallway, and after a lot of stairs you will find The India Yellow Studio on the third floor. When you enter the studio, you will find on your left the living area which consists of a big sofa and flatscreen TV, a dining area and a big kitchen. The kitchen has everything you need; a dishwasher, a big fridge, a Nespresso coffee machine, a water boiler, a combi oven, enough cooking material and a lot of storage space. The space
Room 1 is a cozy sitting area with a comfortable sofa. The adjoining room has a double bed. The third room also offers a double bed. It has an ensuite bathroom with a large shower, toilet and sink.

The rooms are spacious and light, the windows give out to our garden and a beautiful oak tree in our neighbours garden.

description:
Welcome to Studio Minerva!

It is a home away from home for people who want to stay in Antwerp for a week or more for professional reasons or simply to explore the city. This loft is located in a historical building with connections to the belgian car maker Minerva, hence the name.
Excellent location to get in and out of the city. Quiet and green neighborhood.

The space
The serviced studio consists of 3 rooms: a bedroom with double bed, sitting area and writing table, a reading / living room under the roof with sofa-bed, and a kitchenette with bathroom.
This is a very independent set-up. Your hosts, their children and dog Cesar animate the other rooms in the house. We are all usually off to work/school or enjoying Antwerp so it can be rare to run into each other.
Children: welcome if you take into account the steep stairs that lead to the room under the roof.
A sofa bed is available in the attic room (hosts 1 adult or 2 children).<

description:
Welcome to our ground floor studio flat. We currently live in London but I am originally from Antwerp so we've created this home to come back to when we visit. It's conveniently located near central station (8 minute walk), the neighbourhood is lively and has a great community feel to it, while also being in a quiet street. New places are popping up and the centre is only a 10-minute bike or tram ride away.

The space
This is a studio flat and ideal for a couple. You enter the living space which has a sofa, small desk and a double bed. In the back there's a kitchen, a conservatory, and a sunny courtyard. The bathroom is big with a nice sized walk-in shower. The studio is located on the ground floor. It has been newly renovated so all appliances are new, while respecting the original features of this historic building.

description:
We offer you a bright 'urban jungle' appartment in a dead-end street in a quiet residential area, only 7 minutes away from Antwerp's most interesting and lively quarter, het Zuid.

The space is furnished with lots of plats and vintage furniture and has a cosy garden/terrace.

Bicycles (from the city's convenient Velo-bikesharing system) are included. But if you prefer public transport, trams and busses stop around the corner.

The space
The appartment offers a nice and private terrace, a kitchen with dining room, a spacious living room with a couch which unfolds to a comfortable 2-person bed, and a private toilet. Shower/bath is in the main bathroom, which is shared with the owners.

De gezellige dageraadplaats of moorkensplein vind je op enkele minuten wandelen.

Je kan je gemakkelijk verplaatsen naar andere delen van de stad met de bus/tram/trein of de Antwerpse velokes.

description:
In this super cosy studio at the third floor in the heart of the city of Antwerp, you will find everything you need during your citytrip, business trip or even a longer stay - a double size boxspring bed (140x200), a comfortable sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area with big round table, a flatscreen TV (with Netflix), a compact bathroom and enough storage space for your clothes and luggage. The space

The Auping bed is made with 100% Egyptian cotton bedlinen and for each person we provide a big and a small towel.

The apartment is on a walking distance of all the touristic spots, main shopping street Meir, restaurants, clubs in town. There's public transportation by 4 minutes walking and the central station you is also within walking distance.

1 additional separate toilet

The Gatehouse is part of an exceptional property in the centre of Antwerp. At the frontal view it seems a very small and ordinary house. However, entering through the gate, which used to be the exit for the horse and carriage, you will find a huge hidden garden. Via a metal staircase at the back side of the building, you enter the first floor with kitchen, dining room and living room. The bathroom and an extra dressingroom are at the second floor. A cosy bedroom is located at the third floor.

The space
The building was totally renovated in 2019 and provides all modern comfort with a fully equipped kitchen.

description:
The "Friday Market" is a newly refurbished self catering apartment overlooking the quiet, leafy square of the Vrijdagmarkt. Apart from Friday mornings when there is a bustling bric a brac market, the square is a calm oasis hidden in the middle of the historic centre of old Antwerpen.

A bright living room with a double sofa-bed and gas heating stove, a cozy bedroom with a large double bed, a fully equipped kitchen( nespresso machine, toaster, microwave) and a bathroom with a bath and a shower.

The space
Numerous vintage 'objet d'art', pictures and books adorn the apartment, I hope you like them!
The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there is no lift.

Other things to note
There is a busy Bric a Brac market on Friday mornings which affects car access to the square. The nearest open road is 30 metres from apartment.

description:
Studio Heaven is a beautiful spacious studio in the heart of Antwerp. You'll stay within walking distance of De Meir shoppingstreet, the romantic Old Town, the Cathedral, the Central Station, the Zoo, the Opera,... The light and spacious studio is on the 3rd floor, that's why we call it Studio Heaven. A beautiful and peacefull studio at a top location! There is no elevator in the building, so keep in mind that there are many stairs.
(Due to taxes, we don't rent the studio to companies.)

The space
The studio is light and spacious with a very comfortable double bed (160x200 cm), a closet to hang your clothes, a sitting area with a deluxe sofa bed (2p) and an eating area with a large dining table. There is a separated kitchen and bathroom. The renovated kitchen has a breakfast area, brandnew countertops, a new cookingplate, a new combi-oven and fridge with small freezer. description:
We make your stay as easy as can be. Where you get access to your room without using any keys, so you won’t ever lose them. With a food corner where you can refuel at any time, so you won’t be hangry anymore. With us, you have it your way.

description:
Our B&B has spacious rooms and is designed to guarantee a delicious night’s rest for two people. You have your own bathroom (with a reviving rain shower and powerful hairdryer) and a separate toilet. A safe big enough to hold your laptop computer, Wi-Fi, digital radio and smart TV with sound bar. After a visit to the city, you can take time to relax on our terrace. And if you feel like a snack or a drink, just serve yourself from your well-stocked Honesty Bar.

The space
When designing your room, we put a great deal of attention into ensuring your comfort while taking a proactive approach to the environment. In your bathroom, for instance, you will find an environmentally friendly soap dispenser with high-quality shampoo, conditioner and shower gel.

description:
If you are looking for a charming place with everything you need for a great stay in Antwerp, this is your place. Located in between the hip neighbourhood Het eilandje and the historic city centre. The cathedral, Grote Markt and Groenplaats are only a 5min walk. The fashion district and shopping streets will take you 10 min by foot or 3 min by tram (stops at 100m) to Meir. The MAS museum is right around the corner. There are 2 bakeries with breakfast within 20 meters of the appartement.

The space
This appartement (70m² ) is trendy, cool and newly renovated combining high ceilings with exposed beams, and a cosy wooden floor. It is located at the first floor of a small building, and equipped with a lift. The flat features all the modern facilities you need. Wifi, smart tv, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with rain shower and separate toilet. In the bedroom you will find a queen size hotel bed. The living space has a couch that transforms into a double sofa

description:
An eccentric yet stylish room in the heart of one of Antwerp's oldest protected town houses. Completely renovated with great brand new boxspring beds, private design shower and toilet. A colourful environment with unique wooden floors and brick mantlepiece that breath timeless luxury.

please note that, like for any tourist accommodation in Antwerp, we are obligated to charge tourist tax. This tax is charged separately upon arrival. Thanks for your understanding!

description:
Vlak naast de nieuwe "groene long" van Antwerpen , bieden wij op het gezellige Damplein een cosy ingerichte appartement op het gelijkvloers en een trendy loft op de vierde etage. De verschillende leefruimtes, uitgerust met een knusse sofa hebben aansluitend een volledig ingerichte keuken. De slaapkamer en badkamer zijn voorzien van alle comfort. Tal van sportieve mogelijkheden in de buurt. Zo ook gezellige bars en restaurantjes. In de directe omgeving van het Sportpaleis en Lotto Arena.

The space
Cosy ingerichte appartement op de gelijkvloerse verdieping.
Wij voorzien een Nespresso machine, waterkoker en broodrooster. Shampoo, douchegel, handdoeken en beddengoed liggen klaar bij aankomst.
Mocht dit appartement niet meer vrij zijn, vrij vrijblijvend naar onze andere accomodaties. Een babybedje kan op aanvraag.

description:
You will feel at home at this cozy, recently renovated (summer 2021) apartment (fully furnished). Located in the green corner of Antwerp, you will enjoy the tranquility of a residential area that has many cosy bars, restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries, washing salons, night shops and parks at walking distance. The apartment is very well connected, with bus, tram and train service at each corner and the host offers the Antwerp City Bike rental card for free. Airport is walking distance too.

The space
There are plenty of parking spots right at the street (paying after 2 hours and before 9PM) and the historical city centre is only a 15 minutes tram drive or bike ride away. For those of you who come by bike, you can use the Velo-city bike rental system.

There is one master bedroom (king size bed) and one additional bedroom (bunk bed for two) in 2 seperate rooms.

Upon request you can get weekly cleaning and ironing service (the washing salon is

description:
Cosy duplex apartment on the 4th and 5th floor with a spacious roof terrace. It is located in the city center of Antwerp within walking distance of the shopping district, museums, bars and restaurants. The tram stop (line 7) is right outside the door.
The apartment contains an equipped kitchen with dining table, bathroom with shower, a separate toilet and a living room with TV.
In the living room there is a sofa bed, suitable for 2 people and a desk.

The space
The recently renovated apartment has anything you need for a pleasant stay (short and long term).
The apartment is small but very practically designed. The duplex is located on the upper floors (4th and 5th) of the building.
Because of the new windows the building is nicely isolated from noise outdoors.

description:
Vlak naast de nieuwe "groene long" van Antwerpen , bieden wij op het gezellige Damplein een cosy ingerichte appartement op het gelijkvloers en een trendy loft op de vierde etage. De verschillende leefruimtes, uitgerust met een knusse sofa hebben aansluitend een volledig ingerichte keuken. De slaapkamer en badkamer zijn voorzien van alle comfort. Tal van sportieve mogelijkheden in de buurt. Zo ook gezellige bars en restaurantjes. In de directe omgeving van het Sportpaleis en Lotto Arena.

The space
Wij voorzien een Nespresso machine, waterkoker en broodrooster. Shampoo, douchegel, handdoeken en beddengoed liggen klaar bij aankomst.
Mocht de loft niet meer vrij zijn, vrij vrijblijvend naar onze andere accomodaties. Een babybedje kan op aanvraag.

description:
"In dit licht 1slpk appartement op de tweede verdieping (bereikbaar met lift of trap) heb je een ingerichte keuken met leefruimte en een gezellig klein terras.
Het is een gezellige cosy appartement met een leuk groen uitzicht.

Er is een douche aanwezig en een aparte toilet.
Het appartement bevindt zich in een heel rustige straat vlakbij het Koning Albert Park en op wandelafstand van het centrum (20min). Tal van leuke restaurants in de buurt.

The space
Het is een heerlijke view vanuit de slaapkamer alsook in de leefruimte.
Een ruim en open gevoel.
In de ochtend een koffietje op het terrasje of in je bed :)
Ik hou van alles wat te maken heeft met interieur en dat wil ik graag delen. Welkom

Other things to note
laat me even weten hoe laat je graag incheckt en uitcheckt want er staat een tijdstip bij maar ik ben redelijk flexibel☺️

Welcome to our family house!

some spaces are shared.

* Room with 1 double bed (160) and sofa-bed : private
* Shower room : private
* Toilet room: private use of toilet, host uses only washing machine
* veranda and garden: shared with host
* kitchen: private use but hosts passes through to access veranda and garden

all bedsheets & towels included.

the room is not big, ideally 2 or 3 people. We allow 4.

a middle sized room with a 1m60 double bed and a couch that can be transformed into a bunk bed, with a lot of light. view over veranda and garden.

description:
I am hosting a nice, modern and comfortable studio apartment (50 m²) in one of the most beautiful areas of Antwerp! Everything you need (supermarket, bakery, restaurant, pharmacy, etc.) is right outside the door. In the apartment you will find everything you need to feel at home! The place has good transport links for those arriving by car and is close to Antwerp Central Station.

The space
The studio has been completely renovated in March 2020. There is a more than fully equipped and new kitchen. In the living area you can find a Smart-TV with a Netflix option that you can use for free. There is a comfortable 140 cm sofa bed and additional sheets and pillows on request (for bookings of more than 2 people). The bathroom has a walk-in shower and no bathtub.

This totally renovated apartment is the very first Airbnb combined antique shop in Antwerp. Enter a wonderful apartment with open living area accented by art and antiques. Everything in this apartment is for sale. Atelier Wits is situated in the south 20 min from dowtown Antwerp. This private apartment is suitable for big groups up to 7 people. Below you will find some details on this beautiful getaway.

The space
- Private double apartment, self enter with codelock
- 3 bedrooms (3 single beds, 2 double beds)
- 1 livingroom with table and chairs
- 1 fully equiped kitchen with table and chairs
- 1 bathroom
- 2 toilets
- Wi-Fi throughout the apartment
- Free parking at ''dichterstraat'', around the corner.

Other things to note
Check-in after 15:00
Check-out before 12:00

description:
Bright and Beautiful Triplex Apartment, very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp. This is known to be the best possible tourist location. You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area. The central station is a 15min walk from the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made the reservation. No need to share anything with other guests.

description:
Dit 110m2 groot, gezellig en stijlvol appartement met houten vloer is gelegen in de hippe Zurenborgwijk. Een kop koffie drink je in de ochtendzon op het terras, relaxen kan je in de comfy zetel omringt door de vele planten. De extra slaapkamer is uitgerust met slaapbank met lattenbodem. In de inkomhal vind je ook een aparte WC.

Te voet:
Centraal/Berchem station: 15 min
Dageraadplaats (café's en resto's): 5 min
Bus- of tramhalte: 3-5 min
Supermarkt, bakker en nachtwinkel: 4 min

het appartement is recent gerenoveerd en is gelegen vlakbij het centraal station van Antwerpen. description:
This cute apartment / mini-loft is located in the most charming street of Antwerp. Kloosterstraat has the best antique shops & concept stores as well as great coffee, food and drinks. By foot you can reach great museums, designer shops, Grote Markt, Groenplaats, Het Zuid and let's not forget that from the window you can see the Schelde and the cathedral! Perfect for couples or solo travellers that would like to feel at home and stay in the perfect neighborhood.

The space
I work in film and therefore travel a lot, I live here when I’m home and love my street, neighbors and apartment and hope you do too!

RumpusRoom is a tiny guesthouse with a cozy, relaxing atmosphere where you can feel at home. It's a charming, comfy place to enjoy peaceful and restful nights. As a traveler and creative person I like to guide you through Belgian cultural identity in its widest form as I believe curiosity, sharing and connecting are key values to life. Therefore the guesthouse is kept small; 3 rooms, a living room and a kitchen available to use on appointement (between 8h & 21h30).

The space
A nice private double room with all you need provided; a good comfy double bed (French size), your own little desk and a relax chair. For your clothing and other belongings sliders, shelves and a clothing rack is present. Plus the room itself, as an extra, has its own washbasin and eventualy bathrobes for rent! The walls are nicely decorated with some fine (Belgian) art. You'll always be welcomed with some tasteful tea, coffee and water.

Graag verwelkomen we u in onze eigen woning, een meesterwoning uit 1858, gelegen tussen het oude stadscentrum en het trendy Eilandje. Hier bieden wij twee kamers met eigen badkamer aan.

In onze noordgerichte kamer Liselle geniet u van de combinatie van het authentieke karakter, een eigentijdse inrichting en modern comfort. De kamer is aan de achterkant van het huis gelegen waardoor u in alle rust kan genieten van uw verblijf.

The space
In deze kamer zorgt het boxspring bed (1,60m x 2m) voor uw nachtrust, na een dagje Antwerpen. U beschikt er ook over een privé badkamer met toilet, lavabo en inloopdouche. Badlinnen en een haardroger zijn hierbij voorzien.

Met de leeslampjes kunt u in bed rustig een boekje lezen voor het slapen gaan. In de ochtend kan de dag starten met heerlijk kopje Nespresso of thee in de cosy fauteuil.

description:
Moorkens Room:

Spacious and bright room located at the front, with beautiful views of the wooded square and the monumental old town house of Borgerhout.

Room named after Lodewijk Moorkens, mayor of Borgerhout from 1884 to 1904, who had the town hall built and after whom this square was named. Decoration with historical pictures of this monument of Flemish Neo-Renaissance.

B&B open from 1 July 2020.

Breakfast possible: €12,50 pp.

description:
I offer a bright and spacious room with high ceilings. You have a private shower at your disposal.

My house is located in the calm Zurenborg neighbourhood. Here you can find many restaurants and bars. The train station is only a few minutes walk and public transport and bikes are around the corner.

Enjoy a dip in the pool (May-Sept) or relax in the tropical garden. Please notify me upfront if you want to use the pool (12am-5pm), as this is located in a private space.

The space
This historical mansion was designed in 1891 and was part of a project under supervision of Ernest Dieltiëns for the family Nottebohm.
Its neoclassical style is very charming and the balcony stands out from all other houses in the street.

In 2019 I completely renovated the building and designed the guestroom myself. Your room with onsuite bathroom is located on the first floor.
The ground floor, garden and 2nd floor are private.

From

description:
Bright, new flat of 65 sq meters that comfortably fits 2 people. Flat has a real cozy feel, with lush furnishings & is fully equipped w/ new kitchen & bathroom. Located in Antwerp South's trendy Marnix Place - walking distance to restaurants & shops!

The space
This charming, modern one bedroom apartment is located in the true center of Antwerpse Zuid. Just around the corner you will find Marnixplaats and Leopold de Waelplaats, two of the city's most charming squares, filled with hip bars, great restaurants with outdoor terraces and nice cozy cafés.

It is the ideal location to explore Antwerp by foot. Just a ten minute walk to the Nationalestraat away from the Groenplaats and the historical centre of Antwerp. A five minute walk up to the "Kaaien", from which you can admire the river Schelt. And another five minute walk to the "Huidevettersstraat", one of the main shopping areas!

Op de eerste verdieping kom je binnen in de gezellige keuken met bakstenen muur. De zitkamer is heerlijk om languit een boek te lezen, muziek te beluisteren of een film op Netflix te kijken. description:
We bieden een gezellige Studio in modern-vintage stijl recht aan de populaire en bruisende Marnixplaats in Antwerpen Zuid,
De Studio is voorzien van een comfortabele zithoek, een kitchenette, een groot tweepersoons bed en een private badkamer met inloop regendouche.
Er is gratis wifi en de kamer is voorzien van airconditioning,
De locatie biedt het perfecte startpunt om de leukste plekken van Antwerpen te ontdekken.
We houden het graag amicaal en informeel, good vibes!!

The space
De Studio kijkt recht uit op de Marnixplaats en het grote standbeeld 'Schelde Vrij', Het is een zeer levendige buurt, dus boek hier niet, als je voor rust & stilte komt :)
Er is een kitchenette met genoeg servies en kookgerei, mocht je zelf wat willen klaarmaken en er is een Illy espresso machine met espresso capsules voor een goede start van de dag.
In de douche vind je 2 verschillende douchegels van Rituals.

description:
Deze gerenoveerde gastensuite bevind zich in een 19e eeuwse burgerwoning, centraal gelegen te Antwerpen.
De gastenkamer omvat een privé badkamer met regendouche, toilet en wastafel. Verder is er een ruim bed (160cm), zitgelegenheid en een keukenhoek met koelkast, koffiemachine en microgolfoven.

Je hebt je eigen verdieping in ons huis.

description:
This ancient farmhouse is the oldest house in the neighbourhood!
It has had many faces through the ages: originally built for a farm, before it changed into this well decorated and cosy house.
It’s in a small and quiet street, with few cars. Public transportation is very close by, as are the shared A-Velo's and free parking. The beautiful park "Rivierenhof" is just around the corner! De Roma, Trix, OLT and Sportpaleis on walking distance!
This is the ideal hideout to discover Antwerpen.

The space
Downstairs there is a cozy living room with a TV, large dining table and very practical kitchen. Upstairs there is a small but comfortable office desk, a small bathroom and a spacious bedroom with a very comfortable bed.

Guest access
It's all yours!

Other things to note
It's a heavy populated area, so thanks for having respect for each other!
