description:
Enkele jaren geleden verhuisden we naar het prachtige Fort Lillo. Met grote passie hebben we er de voormalige bibliotheek verbouwd tot een uiterst licht en ruim huis voor onszelf en onze 4 kinderen.
Lillo is, met zijn 50 inwoners, een groene oase midden in de Antwerpse haven en beschermd patrimonium.
Elk half uur brengt een boot ( waterbus) je pal in het centrum van Antwerpen voor prachtige musea, winkels, theaters, parken, cafés en restaurants.
Unieke locatie als perfecte uitvalsbasis!

The space
Deze voormalige bibliotheek straalt rust uit, net zoals de rest van het dorp. Als beschermd patrimonium heeft Lillo een uniek karakter. Voor wie graag een dagje in huis blijft, is er de rust van het dorp: Lillo is autovrij (parking op 30m van ons huis) en ideaal voor kinderen om buiten te spelen.
In het huis is een pooltafel, home cinema, een piano, roeimachine en een Playstation waar je allemaal gebruik mag van maken.
Ook bedlinnen en badhandd

description:
Dit licht appartement op de eerste verdieping vind je op de groenste plek van heel Antwerpen.
Vlakbij stroomt de rivier en is er een bos met Manege.
Het is hier heerlijk rustig, groen en toch vlakbij de stad.
De stad bereik je heel snel per fiets, tram of boot.
De woning biedt alles aan wat je praktisch nodig hebt.
Alle toestellen zijn aanwezig, een wasmachine, een droogkast en een smart tv met Netflix etc
Parkeren in de straat is gratis en er is altijd plaats.
Mogelijkheid van 2 bedden is er.

The space
The appartment his super cosy and filled with natural light.
It is cool in summer due to the trees in front.
The appartment is not big but super funcional.
If you stay with four people/two couples you could close a door to give each other privacy.
I can't really list any downsides to this ideal location.
Because that is really the eyecatcher here, nature and silence.

description:
WALKING DISTANCE FROM CITY CENTER!
Only 5 minutes walk to trendy neighbourhood "t Zuid", 20' walk or 10' bike ride to City center.

Welcome to your home-away-from-home in Antwerp. You’ll have a fantastic time here!

The apartment is located in one of Antwerp’s tallest buildings on the 15th floor. This gives you the most amazing panoramic view over Antwerp. Everything is recently renovated and the furniture is brand-new.

The space
The bathroom is provided with a rain shower and bathtub that gives you the possibility to relax after a busy day of visiting the city. Towels will be available for our guests, as is a hairdryer. Showergel will be at your disposal.

We all want a good-night’s sleep after a long day in the city, and that’s why we have provided the apartment with the most comfortable and brand-new boxspring. Sheets will be available for our guests. There is also a built-in closet next to the bed that you can use.

description:
A spacious, bright, 130 SQM flat in the heart of Antwerp. We renovated the flat to make it our home, mid bauhaus, mid bobo with focus on comfort & aesthetics. Life moved us to Lisbon, so the place is all yours =)

This is not a place for party-goers (we respect our neighbours). But a young family out for the weekend, an expat looking for a longer-term fixed place, or one or two couples that want to enjoy a get-away are very welcome.

PS: best restaurants 5' away: Le John, Life is Art, Mampoko,..

The space
All the elements I collect around the world are on display in the flat. I like a small amount of kitsh, some ancient furniture in combination with more modern pieces. As long as it has a soul. However, I did not want to overcharge the flat, so there's still plenty of white space and it's very bright.

description:
centraal gelegen op toplocatie

The space
Gerenoveerd mooi en gezellig gemeubelde studio op toplocatie met veel lichtinval en vrij uitzicht. Het werd ingericht met een zachte industriële look en is voorzien van alle comfort. De rustige studio bevindt zich op de 8de verdieping aan de achterkant van de Franklin Rooseveltplaats. Er is een lift.
Indeling:
Inkomhal met ruime vestiairekast. Woonkamer op parket met grote ramen. Aparte keuken met vaatwasmachine, combi oven, dampkap en ingebouwde koelkast met vriesvak en keramisch kook vuur. Verder is er nog een aparte slaaphoek met een boxspring bed (af te sluiten met een jaloezie), badkamer met douche en apart toilet, lavabokast met spiegelkast en wasmachine.
Het appartement is gelegen aan de Franklin Rooseveltplaats vlak bij het Centraal Station van Antwerpen, tram- en busstops voor de deur of om de hoek. De winkelstraat Meir, Opera Ballet Vlaanderen, cinema, supermarkt, retaurants of gewoon iets drink

description:
Located in the "Theaterbuurt" of Antwerp, within walking distance of the central station and the center, furnished duplex of ± 90 m².

The furnished duplex consists of a spacious entrance hall with separate toilet and cloakroom, furthermore this floor consists of a bedroom that connects to the bathroom with double sink and walk-in shower. The living area consists of a fully equipped kitchen that connects to both the dining and living areas, and there is also a pleasant terrace.

The space
Other: the furnished apartment is equipped with home automation and LED lighting. There is a storage room in the basement.

Ideal for a city lover due to the unique and central location of this duplex. Public transport and central station within walking distance, close to schools and shops, not far from the opera and cinema.

description:
A nice&cozy private apartment ca. 80m2 with one bedroom (two-persons), bathroom (incl. bathtub), hallway, kitchen and living room.
It is located on the 1st floor of a private building.
Nearby supermarket, restaurant, stores and forest.
Nearby highways and public transport.
(30min by public transport and 20 min by car to go to city center Antwerp)

Free parking on the street in front of the building.

For any questions, please feel free to contact me via personal message. :)

Have a nice stay!

The space
The space is recently renovated and equipped with new windows and isolated double glass.
If you like reading, you can enjoy yourself at our reading corner.

New boiler is installed for warm water and heating since January 2022. :)

Other things to note
Please be aware that check-in should be before 20 o’clock, but it depends on our planning. We don’t have fixed check-in time.

description:
The guest house is decorated with the designs/art of our brands. It’s blurring the lines between environment and experience, style and lifestyle, history and present. From the beauty products in the bathroom to the art on the walls, nearly every unforgettable detail of our home is designed to become part of yours.

The space
The house counts a separate living-, dining- and sleeping area and a fully equipped private bathroom. Outside we have a communal patio with a wood-fired oven (on request).

In the dining room you will find basic kitchen tools (a tea kettle, Nespresso,  a toaster, a small fridge,  table ware) and we serve our own favorite breakfast (homemade granola, yogurt, acaï, fresh seasonal fruit and coffee, thee). In our tiny shop you can buy some special local products for mind and body (local beer, natural wines, middle eastern ice cream, beauty products of Ray) and a curated selection of small home accessories we love to take a little bit Om

description:
Bright and Beautiful Apartment, very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp. This is known to be the best possible tourist location. You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area. The central station is a 15min walk. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The whole apartment.

description:
Light and quiet. This space offers the most calming ambiance. On a quiet street in the best part of Antwerp. The flat is 40m2 and feels spacious because of tall windows and high ceilings. Private entrance with a closet, equipped kitchen with island that can function as a desk, balcony with small table and two chairs, large bathroom/shower, comfortable sofa, smart TV, bedroom has a high-end wall bed and lots of cupboard space. Bed, kitchen and bath linens provided.

Non-smoking building.

The space
The space feels great. As the owners we spent two months living in the apartment to set it up for convenience and comfort. It does not have a dishwasher but once the pandemic ends there are so many great restaurants within walking distance that you will want to be out and about. There are many take-away places nearby during COVID and a number of local delivery services for food and groceries. There is a laundromat less than a block from the apartment

description:
Luxurious spacious 9th floor 100 sqm apartment (fully renovated 2020) with amazing park views in a historic residential area just outside the city center (15 min tram/bus/bike ride). Public transportation, rental city bikes, food & drinks, supermarkets around the corner. Next to Middelheim open air museum, Antwerp Expo, University, ZNA Middelheim, UZA, main Antwerp hospitals and Olympic aquatic center. Free parking on the street. Fully furnished apartment in Central Antwerp. Two spacious bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, 2 bathrooms, separate toilet and living room + terrace . Wifi is included. description:
Charming ground floor apartment with west oriented garden in a 16th century monastery building in the center of the city! You will find a beautifully decorated open space with high ceilings, wooden floors, big windows, a 4 centuries old brick wall and an authentic mosaïc floor in the hallway to the garden. The apartment is fully furnished by interior brand Little Nomad, and (almost ;) ) everything you see is for sale!

Follow us on the gram @houseoflittlenomad

The space
When you’re in the building, take the left door to enter our groundfloor apartment. It’s west oriented with a nice terrace and garden, all for yourself. The building is an old monastery dating from the 16th century and a lot of the original charm has been kept or restored like the high wooden ceilings, beautiful facade, mosaïc tiles in the hallway to the garden and a beautiful brick wall in the living room that is as old as the building itself.

Besides all this, the apartment also has a spacious balcony where you can enjoy a morning coffee in the sun. The apartment is fully furnished and all utilities are present (WIFI, digital TV, modern equipment,...)

description:
Luxurious, peacefull apartment full of light with balcony view on a green patio garden within the centre of Antwerp. Situated on a top location in a high end residence, close to public transport & city-bikes. Within walking distance from theatres, restaurants, shopping area's, historic monuments and museums. Discover Antwerp at its best, with this stylish, new, fully equipped 2 bedroom appartment with private secured underground parking space is the best option for a longer stay.

The space
The entire apartment is at your disposal. It has a hall, a spacious living room with fully equipped open kitchen and dining area, 2 terraces, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with rain shower, a laundry room and a separate toilet. It's reachable by elevator from main hall of private parking space.

description:
Renovated apartment with equipped kitchen with living room and terrace. 1 bedroom with a double bed. The bathroom has a walk-in shower and a toilet. There is a separate dressing room/office room. The bottom floor is a TV room with 2 sofa beds, and there is a laundry room (washing machine+dryer). Located on trendy South, in the middle of restaurants, bars and shopping streets (Kloosterstraat).

Guest access
Gratis parking aan Sint-Michielskaai
Tram en bus om de hoek (Nationalenstraat en Mechelsplein)
Fietsdeel station op 2 min wandelen

Free parking at Sint-Michielskaai
Trams and buses around the corner (Nationalenstraat en Mechelsplein)
Bike sharing station at 2 min walking

Other things to note
Keep in mind that due to laws and regulations of the city of Antwerp you will be asked to transfer €2,97 citytax per person per night which are NOT included in the final price of the accomodation

description:
Right in the historic heart of Antwerp, we host a fully equipped, renovated apartment inside an antique building.

A 1 minute walk to the main square "Groenplaats" on a quiet street. A 15 min walk to the Central Station and less than 5 min walk to the famous shopping street "Meir". We are surrounded by several lunch bars and fashion shops. The cities top restaurant area is also less then 5 min walking from the apartment.

The best possible place for an amazing stay in Antwerp! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made

description:
Hi and welcome! this is my little place :)
Stay for a citytrip and enjoy a nice bath in my calm neighborhood at the heart of the city. Or stay after a concert at Sportpaleis or even Tomorrowland!

All public transportions nearby.
An elevator to take you up, a little terrace to enjoy your morning coffee or evening smoke.
Cafe/theater/restaurants/grocery stores are found around the corner
Shopping streets all at walking distance
A lot of parking options, ranging from 0 to 20EUR a day.

Other things to note
Hi there! Don’t forget to bring a hairdryer if you need one!

description:
Spacious & modern city two-bedroom apartment (3rd floor) , located right across a beautiful park. The green environment brings you immediate peace. 1 master bedroom, 1 dressing/working room, big open kitchen, dining table, living room, bathroom, laundry facilities, small terrace,...
Located very central, station/metro/busses really nearby. Fast access to highway and public transport.

The space
Modern ingericht appartement, volledig omringd door groen. Het uitzicht vanuit de woonkamer, slaapkamer & werkkamer hebben een rustgevende sfeer. Gelegen in een aangename maar gunstige buurt te Berchem. Op 10 minuten ben je in het stadscentrum.

description:
In the middle of the vibrant South, the trendy hotspot in central Antwerp with terraces, cocktailbars, dancecafes, restaurants, museums and shopping.

Including a corona proof breakfast. Bake off croissants and pistolets in your oven. L'Or coffee with 10 flavours in capsules. Eggs, cheese, nutella, 4 jams, mineralwater and fruit juice. Bottle of Cava included per stay. Dummies guide to a romantic breakfast with the goodies in your fridge.
Crystal glasses, plates en cutlery from Villeroy&Boch

The space
Characteristic mansion build in 1896 with 4,3 meter authentic ceilings, completely renovated to modern comfort standards.

When you step out of the door, your view will catch the stunning Museum of Fine Arts at the end of the street. Captivating.

description:
Cozy ground floor apartment with garden in Ekeren.
Lots of natural light.
The kitchen is well equipped including a dishwasher.
2 bedrooms, one with a double boxspring bed, one with a a single bed/two beds. Both have acces to the garden.

The appartement is renovated in 2021.

Free parking in street in front of the building.

Nearby supermarket, highway, park and public transport (train/bus).

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me in a personal message.
Have a nice stay!

Other things to note
Domicile not possible, only after consultation.

description:
🔑 A cosy hideaway in the centre of Antwerp.

The apartment is fully equipped & contains a living room, kitchen, dining space, bathroom, bedroom with adherent wardrobe & working space and a shower.

Within walking distance:
🚊 central station
🛍 Meir: shopping area
🏃🏻‍♂️central park: jogging, chilling, playground

🦒 Antwerp zoo

🚌 🚃 bus & tram stops in front

description:
Located in Antwerp and only 200 metres from Plantin-Moretus Museum, Luxury Suites Boutique provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cathedral of Our Lady, Groenplaats Antwerp and Meir. The nearest airport is Antwerp International Airport, 5 km from Luxury Suites Boutique.

description:
Modern apartment inside a notary house built in 1906. The apartment is renovated in a light & colorful style, the decorative ceilings are fully restored in its original glory.

High glass doors separate the living area& desk from the kitchen/dining. A sliding door "disguised" as a painting opens up the bedroom. Opening all partitions, you create a nice open space. Additionally, there is a small bathroom and separate toilet.

Residential area, close to the trendy area PAKT & Antwerp Brewery.

description:
Looking for a place to stay on probably one of the best locations in Antwerp? Look no further.. This is it

You will stay on the Vogeltjesmarkt (right in the citycenter) just a few mins from the shoppingstreet Meir, botanical garden, central station, zoo... in a historical building

Each weekend you'll find a market here with all kinds of treats from all over the world. Everything in walking distance (also there is lots of public transport so u Don’t have to worry about taxi fares)

The space
This apartment is suitable for 4 persons,
the sofa can unfold into a double sleeping-bed for 2 adults,
the bedroom is a dual size bed for 2 adults aswell.

description:
Studio Stad has been completely renovated to give you the boutique hotel experience! The apartment is located in the heart of the old city with a view on the river ‘Schelde’. Several museums are not only at walking distance like MAS but you stay in an amazing open air museum since the old city is so close with the cathedral, grote markt,’t Steen and many more. Antwerp is known for its great shopping and restaurants too, all at walking distance.

The space
The apartment has all the amenities you will need for your stay. A nespresso coffee maker, wifi, internet radio and tv. The kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet are all brand new. A big table for up to 6 people can also be the perfect quiet working place. The open view on the river is a great experience.

Other things to note
There is an airco unit in the living room as also a mobile ventilator for the bedroom.

Outside you can immediately jump on a city bike to discover all that Antwerp has to offer. Afterwards you can go home with lots of positive energy. Hopefully you are as enthusiastic as we are. It is such a delightful place to be. That is why I love WAM.

The space
In between enjoying all the assets of the loft. Lots of light and space and a kitchen that invites you to cook delicious meals for yourself or your company. description:
Welcome in my apartment located close to Antwerp city centre. It is located in a quiet residential neighborhood. You can expect a cozy bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, living room, a large garden (with fire pit) and a modern bathroom. My personal bedroom is not accessible but otherwise you’ll have the full apartment at your disposal like you see in the pictures. I hope you will enjoy it ! :)

The space
The apartment is decorated with particular love for woody elements, plants and some antique eyecatchers. It is also my home so please treat it like it was yours.

Guest access
You have access to the garden and all the rooms, except for my personal bed room.

Other things to note
No parties are allowed. Please ask me before inviting other people to the apartment.

description:
Unique apartment with a view on giraffes, elephants and gnoes!

Ideally located: 5 min walk to the Central Station, tram of 10 minutes to the Grande Place and 15 min walk to the city centre.

Perks: a lot of natural light, quietly located, a small balcony, wifi and tv, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom

The space
Situated at the 4th (highest) floor and there is an elevator. The kitchen and living room have a view of the zoo and the bedroom is situated at the back of the building so there is no noise of the street. There is also a small balcony.

Kitchen: fridge and freezer, induction plate, oven, dishwasher, washing machine and coffee machine
Bathroom: rain-shower and sink
Bedroom: double bed and a lot of storage space

The living room with open kitchen is very light and spacey.

description:
This is a newly renovated studio apartment in the South of Antwerp. One of the best areas to live in. Calm but at the same time in a lively area. Best galleries are on walking distance and you'll have plenty of bars and restaurants to choose from. It's not a tourist area so if you want to experience local Antwerp, this place might be perfect for you.

There is a park nearby and also a 5min walk to the riverside will spoil you with the best sunsets and evening walks. If you can, bring skates!

The space
The studio apartment has a mezzanine and a separate bedroom. A fully equipped kitchen that is easy to use (including all the spices you need) , cozy living space and a foldable table to make it bigger The bathroom has a rain shower and towels and soap are available.

The apartment is on the fourth floor so prepare yourself for some stairs. There is a newly installed air conditioner available for the hot summers and extra sheets for winter.

description:
Charming apartment in historical building next to the ‘Handelsbeurs’ in the city center. Located very close to the shopping area, museums, main squares ‘Grote Markt, Groenplaats, Theaterplein(market), Graanmarkt’. The best possible location for a visit to Antwerp! The Central station is a 5min walk from the apartment, car parking 50m from apartment (Q-Park Handelsbeurs).

The space
Charming and recently renovated apartment with fully equiped kitchen (fridge,dishwasher,combi-oven,cooking material,coffee machine Nespresso,water boiler). The apartment is completely private, no need to share anything with other guests. Private entrance with spacious entrance hall, possible to store bicycles. Luxury bathroom with shower,sink and toilet. Romantic sleeping room with queen size boxspring bed and view to the historical Handelsbeurs (TV available for streaming). We supply fresh linen and towels.

description:
You’ll be getting a private room in a charming, old 60’s appartment in the City centre of Antwerp. The appartement is close to central station and close by Antwerps largest shopping strip the ‘Meir’. The neighbourhood is very multicultural and vibrant, but once in the appartment very calm and quiet.

The space
It is a private room in a 3 bedroom appartement from a young couple (Inti & Victor as hosts). Inti is half Argentinian and speaks Spanish, English, French, German and Dutch/Flemish. Víctor is Belgian and speaks al of the above, but not German. We love travelling and getting to know other people, so everybody welcome!

Guest access
You will have a private bedroom to your acces, with a lock on it. The little terrace, bathroom and toilet are shared. Any more questions, shoot!

description:
(Niet voor overnachting!)
Soul Studio is een deels bemeubelde daglicht studio in het hartje van Antwerpen die bestaat uit 3 grote ruimtes van in totaal 180m2.

De stijl van de studio is warm minimalistisch, wat prachtig aansluit bij de grandeur van het voormalige bankgebouw waar de studio is gevestigd. Met authentiek visgraatparket, hoge plafonds van meer dan 4 meter en grote ramen, is dit de perfecte plek voor jouw foto- of videoproject, coachings of meeting, podcast-opname of livestream.

The space
SOUL is een grote, open ruimte (85m2) waar je al je creativiteit kan laten gaan. Met voldoende props en meubels, maar ook verschillende papieren, stoffen en houten backdrops in verschillende kleuren, creëer je zo met gemak je eigen settings voor je foto- en videoprojecten.

De ruimte kan ook omgebouwd worden tot heuse studio voor o.a. livestreams en workshops.

De huidige kleuren papieren backdrops zijn: wit, beige, donker terraco

description:
Located in the historical center of Antwerp (Sint Andries) 5 min walk from the magnificent cathedral and all the cosy cafes, restaurants, shops that Antwerp has to offer. We are tucked away on a peaceful side street of the Nationalestraat and the Kammenstraat . From here out you can visit the whole city on foot.
Across the street there is a supermarket and a public parking. Also the tram is just 50 meter away from the street.

The space
The studio is located on the ground floor of the building.
Where you will have access to your own private city garden from the studio.
You will have a separate private bathroom with shower and toilet.

Fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and dryer, towels, sheets, television, WIFI, tea, coffee...

Welcome!

Volledig gerenoveerd herenhuis in de heerlijkste straat van Antwerpen Zuid! Je hebt een ruime privé slaapkamer. De nieuwe groen, marmeren badkamer deel je met 1 andere gast. De rest van het huis — zoals een prachtige nieuwe keuken mét vaatwasser.

Voel je vooral thuis en zet je gezellig op het half overdekte terras!

The space
We hebben zoveel mogelijk aspecten van het herenhuis terug gebracht naar de oorspronkelijke staat maar op een moderne manier mét een design knipoog naar de Japanse stijl die rust uitstraalt!

Heel rustig gelegen en toch op minder dan 10 minuten wandelafstand van het centrum van de stad (5' met fiets).

description:
Historic loft with insanely high ceilings of 4 meters high, the loft is one open space of approximately 100m².

Let yourself be pampered in your own private loft in a quiet historic building in the former military hospital of Antwerp.

Close to star restaurant The Jane and hotel August (1 minute walk) with an incredibly beautiful bar (must see).

There is no traffic in the district, so you are in the center of Antwerp and yet so quiet.

Hopefully see you soon.

The space
the loft is one open space: the first thing you notice when you enter is the space, the volume
you arrive in a 150-year-old building that has been completely restored with a lot of love for its architecture
the walls and ceilings have been literally restored brick by brick

the entrance zone runs in the same breath past an office space into the living room with open kitchen
because of the high ceilings and large windows on both sides

The Antwerpen-Berchem train station is on walking distance with direct connections with Brussels, Rotterdam and Amsterdam.

description:
Musa is a unique stay situated in the trendy district ‘t Zuid, the “artistic heart” of Antwerp. The rooms are decorated with tropical plants and furnished with natural materials which immediately give a relaxed vibe. All the main tourist attractions are easily accessible by foot, citybike or metro. Within minutes walk there are plenty of restaurants, coffee bars, musea, shops, concept stores and there's an active nightlife scene.

Other things to note
It is possible to order breakfast:
- Vegetarian
- 100% organic
- Served in the room

The price is €16,50 per person and has to be ordered at least 1 week in advance!

description:
Gezellig ingerichte slaapkamer met privé-badkamer en gedeelde inkom in flat in rijhuis in centrum Antwerpen, vlakbij Centraal Station dichtbij openbaar vervoer en wandelafstand tot Meir.
De ruimte biedt géén mogelijkheid tot leefruimte of keuken.

The space
Gezellige slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed (b 160 x l 200 cm), kledingrek met 8 hangers, stoel, LC4 Corbusier chaise longue, kamerscherm, sfeerverlichting en 85% verduisterende gordijnen.
Via een gedeelde inkom heeft u toegang tot de slaapkamer en badkamer voor uw eigen gebruik. De badkamer is uitgerust met een moderne douche, wastafeltje met haardroger en toilet. De andere ruimtes zijn niet toegankelijk.

Guest access
Het treinstation Antwerpen-Centraal is gelegen op wandelafstand, alsook mogelijkheden tot openbaar vervoer (bus / tram). In de nabije buurt bevinden zich 3 commerciële parkings (dagtarieven rond 30 euro/24u).
Parkeren op straat is mogelijk maar betalend tot 19u.

description:
Hi, my name is Maxime. Welcome to Antwerp!

My place is a bright 1-bedroom apartment on the 3rd floor of a small building. There's an elevator so you don't have to carry your bags up the stairs.

The neighborhood 'Het groen kwartier' is a fun and family friendly. Close by you'll find coffeeshops, bars and fun restaurants to visit.

The apartment is available for long stays starting from 21 days.

The space
You enter through a small hallway into a spacious and bright living room.

The kitchen is open an has a fridge+freezer/ oven/ stovetop.

The bedroom has a queen size bed (160cm) with a brand new mattress.

The bathroom has as a bathtub/shower.

Guest access
My place is a 10 min walk from Berchem station.

You can get to the city center in 20 min by tram/bus or citybike all located within 500m from the apartment.

description:
In this super cosy studio at the third floor in the heart of the city of Antwerp, you will find everything you need during your citytrip, business trip or even a longer stay - a queen size Auping bed (160x200), a comfortable sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area with big round table, a flatscreen TV (with Netflix), a compact bathroom and enough storage space for your clothes and luggage. The perfect base to explore Antwerp from!

The space
After climbing the stairs to the third floor you will enter the studio with your key and enter the tiny hallway with built-in closet and bathroom door. You will step right into the living area where you can find on your right hand the queen size bed, in the middle of the room the living area with sofa bed and TV with Netflix and on your left the dining area with the big kitchen around the corner.
The Auping bed is made with 100% Egyptian cotton bedlinen and for each person we provide a big and a small towel.

description:
Bright and Beautiful Apartment, very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp. This is known to be the best possible tourist location. You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area. The central station is a 15min walk. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made the reservation. No need to share anything with other guests.

description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. This one bedroom apartment is located in the high fashion 'Schuttershofstraat' in Antwerpen next to the Meir. It is situated next to the Bourla Schouwburg where there are weekly theater productions. Close to the Graanmarkt where you have nice bars & restaurants . On saturday you have the famous 'vogeltjesmarkt' which is a marketplace with fresh foods & herbs. The train stations and trams are all reachable within a 5 minute walk.

The appartment is very spacious with 100sqm surface. Recently renovated to high standard level. The appartment is very centrally located in the city , but extremely calm, since no traffic is allowed in the street. It has 2 terraces and is part of a gated community with common space. description:

Het huis is een triplex met veel licht en is gelegen vlakbij het hippe mechelse plein en de kammenstraat. Er is een terras van 10m2 dat gedeeld wordt de buren. Twee slaapkamers, elk met dubbel bed, moderne keuken en badkamer. Alles is er voor een zorgeloos verblijf in Antwerpen.

The space
Het gelijkvloers is een garage met wasplaats met wasmachine en droogkast en wc. Een wenteltrap leidt naar de eerste verdieping met amerikaanse keuken (smeg toestellen) en gezellige leef- en eetruimte. Op de tweede verdieping is er een badkamer met inloopdouche, lavabo en wc en een slaapkamer met dubbel bed. Op de derde verdieping een grote kamer met dubbel bed.

Guest access
auto parkeren kan in de garage op het gelijkvloers

description:
Very cute apartment in Antwerp city with an abundance of light! I am renting it out to someone who knows something about plants, since they will need watering while I'm away! Prepare yourself for an authentic homey-feeling, because I am welcoming you in my home.

20 minutes walking to the Grote Markt, de Meir or de Groenplaats. Tram 1 or 10 (to the central station or the city center) are just a 2-minute walk.

Kind neighbors, small grocery stores but also large supermarkets 5 minutes away.

The space
Most importantly, I am looking for someone who understands the age of the building. My apartment has beautiful light falling in through its large windows, has high ceilings (3.5 m!) but also has old and creaky floors, only one sink (in the kitchen) and thus bares traces of its age. I wish to welcome someone who wishes to feel like home and who respects other people's belongings. I, unfortuantely, do not rent out a hotel chamber, but my actual home

The space
There is place for max 4 adults (1 bed and 1 inflatable matrass) or a couple with 1 or 2 children.

Free indoor parking. Focus on cleanliness. Downtown.

The space

> Lots of sunlight, look down on the bustling city life beneath and the Belle-Epoque streets of the Zurenborg quarter
> Unlimited Wi-Fi
> Personal comfort hosting ~our way~ ; e.g. who likes to wait for check-in or rush to check-out? Let's reverse it!
> Flexible early check-in/late check-out

- 2 bedrooms: a double bed and 2 single beds
- 1 bathroom with a tub and shower

description:
Deze sfeervolle wellness loft geeft je het comfort van je eigen private suite, midden in de stad.

Geniet van ongeziene privacy en luxe op slechts enkele minuten wandelen van de grootste Antwerpse bezienswaardigheden.

Een bezoekje aan het internationaal bekende MAS Museum?
Een gezellige wandeling langs de Scheldekaaien?
Een dagje shoppen op de Meir, eindigend met een koffietje op de Groenplaats?
Al deze mogelijkheden en nog veel meer is vlakbij te ontdekken.

Other things to note
Maak vrij en onbeperkt gebruik van het aanwezige bubbelbad en de infraroodsauna. Dit type sauna warmt je hele lichaam op via 100% natuurlijk infrarood licht. Dit zorgt voor een veel diepgaander detox effect, met het meest zalige stressloze gevoel als resultaat.

Boek deze oase van sfeer, klasse en rust middenin het hartje van Antwerpen vandaag nog en ervaar het voor jezelf.

The space

There is one master bedroom (king size bed) and an additional bed in the living room.
Upon request we can add a baby bed or additional matresses.

description:
Bright and spacious apartment on three floors at a central location in the South of Antwerp. Great location on a square full of buzzing little bars. Within walking distance of the South (Het Zuid) and the city center. The apartment has a sunny balcony in the front and a patio in the back. Two spacious bedrooms with double beds. Ideal for families or 2 couples.

PS. Tourist tax is not included via Airbnb -> this is €3 per person per night.

The space
First floor: living room and large open kitchen. Balcony and patio.
Second floor: one large bedroom, spacious bathroom with bathtub and shower. Separate toilet. Walk-in closet.
Third floor: large second bedroom.

Guest access
Paid parking on the street. Very close to the ring road, exit Antwerp South. Antwerp South station is a 10-minute walk away. Buses and trams nearby.

On top of that, it's within walking distance of the historic city centre and the central station. The ideal base for a wonderful city trip. A carefree holiday with access to a fully equipped flat. I hope to meet you soon!

The space
This modern appartement on the 4th floor is accessible by lift or stairs. It contains a fully equipped kitchen with a combi oven and microwave, espresso machine, pots and pans, …, a living room with access to a lovely west-oriented balcony with lounger and cushions, a sleeping room with double bed and closet to store your clothes, a bathroom with shower, a toilet and a storeroom.

If you book for an extra (3th) person there is also access to a second room with sleeping sofa for one person. There is a possibility to add an extra sleeping mattress on the floor.

Each bedroom is on a separate floor which gives you the right amount of privacy. There is also a patio for the hot and sunny days.

During your stay it is fully private. On days it is not booked I occasionally live there. Therefore it really feels like a home rather than a hotel. I focus on creating a homely atmosphere. Guests can use all kitchen products and other utilities available.

Freshly renovated private bathroom.
The house is ideally situated with all local shops, bars and monuments less then 5 minutes walking away.

The house is a protected monument, formerly owned by the knight Arnold Van Liere, mayor of Antwerp in the Middle Ages

*NEW* Enjoy a stylish getaway for two at this completely renovated 96 m2 triplex, in the historic centre of Antwerp. Our brand new loft-like apartment offers a large cosy living room, a fully equipped open kitchen, a spacious bathroom, a comfy and quiet bedroom and a fully wired office space. Old and new elements are combined and give just that unique vibe to fit nicely with a vibrant city as Antwerp. We live next door and are always available for your questions about our lovely city. Welcome!

The space
**NEW LISTING Sept. 21**
We only just opened our triplex for guests and are eager to welcome you at our place. That's also the reason why there aren't many reviews yet ;-)

What to expect:

*First floor*

Entry hall
When you enter the triplex on the first floor, you arrive in the private entry hall, with some space for coats and umbrellas. On that same level, you find a separate toilet and access to the bathroom.

description:
Cosy, spacious and luminous apartment at walking distance from the central station.

The space
When you enter the apartment from the hallway you will find the living room, kitchen and terrace on your right. It’s an open kitchen connected to the living room. The living room is very wide and luminous. Connected to the living room you will also find a cute terrace that has sun all afternoon.
In the hallway on the right you will find 3 other rooms that are available to the guest: the toilet, the bathroom with a shower and sink and the bedroom. One room is not available for guest and will always be locked, this is a private room that is not available for Airbnb guests.

description:
My apartment is located in the heart of historic Antwerp. Within walking distance of the cathedral, the river, cozy terraces, museums, shops. Located in a car free pedestrian street. The decor is new with stylish furniture, made by myself. A free parking is a few minutes by car. I'll take you to the parking lot when you arrive and leave.
Remember that you have to pay 3 € tourist tax per night and per person, this is to be paid separately, separate from airbnb. Have a great time

Living room with kitchen (oven, hob, microwave, fridge), 1 bedroom with double bed and bath, 1 bedroom with double bed and shower. The sofa can be used as a sofa bed, an extra mattress is provided if needed.

description:
Deze net gerenoveerde gastensuite bevind zich in een 19e eeuwse burgerwoning, centraal gelegen te Antwerpen.
De gastenkamer omvat een privé badkamer met regendouche, toilet, vrijstaand bad en wastafel. Verder is er een ruim bed (160cm), zitgelegenheid en een keukenhoek met koelkast, koffiemachine en microgolfoven.
De perfecte plek als uitvalbasis voor je bezoek aan Antwerpen

Opgelet: toeristenbelasting wordt apart afgerekend bij het begin van het verblijf en bedraagt €2,8/nacht per volwassene

The space
De gastensuite bevindt zich op de 3e verdieping van onze burgerwoning, je hebt de gehele verdieping voor jou alleen.
De gehele ruimte is vernieuwd.

Guest access
Je hebt je eigen verdieping in ons huis.
Bij zonnig weer kan je ook op ons terras gaan zitten.
Voor gasten die langer dan 7 nachten blijven is er mogelijkheid tot wassen en drogen (kledij)

Other things to note
Niet binnen

description:
Prachtig afgewerkt en zeer zonnig 3 slpk appartement gelegen in de hippe harmoniewijk. Veel gezellige pleintjes en (h)eerlijke restaurants in de buurt. Super uitgeruste keuken met klein buitenterras. Compacte badkamer met heerlijke regendouche. Masterbedroom met mooi uitzicht. 2 kleinere slaapkamers voor de kids. Snel onbeperkt internet. Stadsdeelfietsen en bus op 200m. Een perfecte uitvalsbasis om de fijnste plekken in Antwerpen te ontdekken.

The space
Authentieke Airbnb beleving, eigenaar woont hier en vandaar luxueuze afwerking. 100m² ruimte !

Guest access
Parkeren kan je in de straat voor 5 euro per dag of 25 euro per week. Gratis parkeren is mogelijk op 1km afstand in de Gerard le Grellelaan net buiten de lage-emissiezone van Antwerpen.

Fietsverhuur
Velo Antwerpen : met een dagpas of weekpas op de fiets door Antwerpen. Er is een Velo-station op 200 meter (Lange Lozanastraat 29).

description:
The space
The loft is easily accessible from the train station (10 min walk or 3 min by metro) or by car (2 public parkings across the street).
Situated on the second floor with elevator, the loft offers all you need to make your stay comfortable: luxurious marble bathroom, queen size bed, fresh linen en towels, Nespresso machine, wifi, TV,..
We kindly advise you for any kind of request.

Other things to note

-any kind of party at the accommodation
-more than 2 guests (2 extra guests max must be notified in advance)
-smoking inside the accommodation/building

description:
Een huiselijk nieuwbouw appartement. Zeer modern ingericht and when entering it Will feel like home! living grenst aan een drukke straat, maar door isolatie ervaart u nauwelijks last. 2 supermarkten aan de overkant ook. De slaapkamer grenst aan de oude bosuilbaan (zeer rustige straat) met toegang tot een ruim terras waar recent kunstgras is gelegd.

Guest access
Op tien minuten wandelen stopt tram 5, die zowel naar Antwerpen als naar het shoppen centrum van wijnegem rijdt. Stopt ook aan het sportpaleis. Bus 19 (5min wandelen) gaat naar Deurne, langs het ziekenhuis, als naar Antwerpen en stopt aan het sportpaleis. Er kan gebruik gemaakt worden van de ondergrondse parkeerplaats vanaf 2 nachten en ik moet aanwezig zijn bij het inchecken om hier toegang tot te geven.

description:
Bright and beautiful industrial style apartment, just renovated, very close to the charming Riverside and to the Cathedral of Antwerp.

This is known to be the best possible tourist location.
You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area.
The central station is a 15min walk from the apartment.

The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely privat

description:
BnB Antwerpen, welkom in het hart van de stad.

De Reyndersstraat ligt midden in het historisch centrum van Antwerpen.
De Groenplaats bevindt zich om de hoek!
Aan het einde van de straat vind je de kaaien en de Schelde.
De Grote Markt en de kathedraal van Antwerpen liggen op 350 meter afstand van het appartement.
De Meir (de langste winkelstraat van Antwerpen) ligt op zo'n 250 meter afstand.

Ons appartement is op de eerste verdieping, te bereiken per trap.

The space
Het appartement Rijenhoek

Een heerlijk rustpunt, in een bruisende stad.
Jouw rustpunt. Jullie rustpunt.
Appartement Rijenhoek is gelegen op de kruising van de Reyndersstraat en Leeuwenstraat.
In het verleden heette deze plek de Rijenhoek, vandaar de naam.
Het pand is in 2017 volledig gerenoveerd en voldoet aan alle eisen van nu.

Midden in het historische centrum, met alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand. Toch

description:
Bright and spacious 1950s apartment on the third floor of a small apartment building. This recently renovated 2-bedroom apartment can accommodate four persons and is located in a quiet one-way street in a vibrant, multicultural area. Shops and supermarkets and a metro and bike station are right around the corner. It’s a 10-minute walk to Central Station. The historical city centre is within walking or biking distance. Parking space is available in the building.

The space
The apartment (140 m2) consists of a spacious living and dining room with office space, a fully equipped semi-open kitchen with dishwasher, two bedrooms (1 master bedroom, 1 with 2 single beds), a bathroom with tub and shower curtain, and a separate toilet. Wifi, hairdryer, towels and washing machine are at your disposal. A travel bed for babies is available upon request.

Guest access
The apartment is located 50 metres from metro stop Elisabeth and the Velo station on Elisa

description:
Welcome to my cosy apartment in Antwerpen :)

Located in a vibrant area at walking distance (15') from the city center.
Close to several parks, brewery de Koninck and jummy restaurants.

The wooden floors, big windows and artworks will instantly make you feel at home.

Hope you will enjoy your stay!

The space
Two bedrooms with double bed (140 and 180cm)
Bathroom with rainshower
Separate toilet
Fully equipped kitchen
Small balcony
Large living room with couch and beamer
Elevator in the building

Guest access
The whole appartement is accessible for guests only.

Other things to note
Parking available in the streets (paid but free on Sunday)
Free parking available (20' walking distance)

description:
Marmina Cathedral is located in the historic center of Antwerp, opposite the Cathedral of Our Lady.

The house is the birthplace of painter David Teniers

Our room offers modern furniture and a private bathroom with free toiletries. The room is also equipped with a TV and free WiFi.

Marmina Cathedral is a 500-metre walk from Antwerp's shopping street de Meir. The Grote Markt with numerous restaurants and cafes is just around the corner. It is a 10-minute walk to the Rubens House.

The space
4th floor

Other things to note
Dear guests, please be aware that before the check in we need to charge you the city tax of 2,8€ per person per night. It is not included to the reservation price because of the rules of the Antwerpen City. Thank You for understanding.

description:
Welcome to our cozy, colourful duplex apartment at the Throne Place!

The light and spacious apartment is a duplex, located on the top floor of the building. It features a south facing terrace facing away from the street - perfect for a morning coffee or evening drinks.

If you walk out the door you can already find some of my favourite spots in Antwerp. Try the butter chicken at Mission Massala or enjoy the perfect cappuccino at Kolonel coffee!

description:
Verblijf in dit herenhuis van meer dan 100jaar oud. Het is gerenoveerd met een oog voor detail en respect voor de oude elementen. Het huis is ruim, telt 2 grote slaapkamers, een prachtige badkamer met zalig ligbad en beneden een grote living, eetruimte en gezellige leefkeuken. Het huis is gelegen in een van de mooiste wijken van Antwerpen, Zurenborg. Deze wijk staat vol mooie huizen en is het waard om eens in rond te wandelen. Daarnaast heeft het leuke pleinen met de gezelligste bars en cafes.

The space
Op de gelijkvloers van dit herenhuis kan je de open keuken, eetkamer, living en terras vinden. Alsook een toilet in de gang. Op de eerste verdieping bevindt zich een slaapkamer en de badkamer. Op de tweede verdieping kan je de tweede slaapkamer vinden. Dit is een grote kamer van 6x8meter.

description:
In the heart of the Antwerp fashion district, you will discover a charming little holiday house. Its an idial base to visit this vibrant town and worldport city. Fashionworld, the musea, zoo, nomerous pubs and restaurants with their beautiful terraces and world famous beers, mostly in walking distance.

The space
Our home allows max 6 people to enjoy privacy in an authentic 18th century house, fully furnisched. There are 2 bed bedrooms and 2 single bed bedrooms. Please enter the exact number of guests, as this information is needed for the tourist tax.
It is not possible to reserve individual rooms. Your booking always includes the whole house. Parking nearby

Guest access
Parking Cammerpoorte around 400 m walkingdistance
Metro is 5 min. walk

description:
Bright and beautiful newly built one-bedroom apartment, very close to the charming Riverside and to the Cathedral of Antwerp.

This is known to be the best possible tourist location.
You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area.
The central station is a 15min walk from the apartment.

The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Our apartment is comfortable, functional and has been designed to give you everything you need during your stay.

description:
Deze centraal gelegen accommodatie is smaakvol ingericht en ideaal gelegen. Tramverbindingen 2 en 6 brengen je, op 10 min., naar Antwerpen centrum. Voor de sportievelingen is er ook een velostation in de straat. De accommodatie zelf is ook ideaal te bereiken via A12 en E19.
In de buurt is er een heerlijke bakker, beenhouwer, Carrefour expres, verschillende restaurantjes, pizza take-out, minigolf, park den Brandt, Nachtegale park,… Kortom deze accommodatie heeft alle troeven!

The space
Er is een volledig uitgeruste keuken aanwezig met verschillende toestellen zoals: broodrooster,panini machine, broodmachine, blender, sapcentrifuge, warmwaterkoker, Nespresso koffiezetapparaat,…
Ook kunnen jullie gebruik maken van gratis Netflix, Telenet tv (play more), gratis WiFi.
Er zijn ook extra dekens, lakens en hoofdkussens.
Zijn er nog vragen, aarzel dan zeker niet om me te contacteren.

Guest access
Er is overal wel plek om gratis

You have the entire apartment to yourself, fully furnished in boho/scandi style. Located on a top location (near public transport, supermarkets and major highways).

The space
The apartment is located on the 3rd and highest floor (accessible by stairs) with a total living area of ​​83.5m². The layout is as follows: entrance hall, open kitchen and living room, 2 bedrooms, bathroom with shower, separate toilet and terrace.

The kitchen and dining area/living room form one open and bright space. The kitchen is fully equipped (oven, dishwasher, fridge with separate freezer, coffee machine, ample storage space, dining counter...).

Through the master bedroom you have access to the cozy terrace. This room has a double bed and a spacious wardrobe. At the rear is the second bedroom with sofa bed and desk, so it is perfect as a workspace.

description:
New Airbnb in the center of Antwerp.
Apartment located on the "Eilandje", the hippest neighborhood of Antwerp. Trendy restaurants and bars in the immediate vicinity. All culture and shopping within a short walking distance from the apartment.

The space
Recent large apartment (80 m²), sunny terrace, fully equipped kitchen, spacious living room, bedroom with double bed, dressing with desk, separate toilet, bathroom with walk-in shower and sink.

Guest access
Public transport: 10 minutes from Antwerp Central Station.
Walking: 20 minutes from Antwerp central station.

Parking: Parking Rijnkaai Scheldekaaien (Rijnkaai 36, 2000 Antwerp), a 3-minute walk from the apartment.

Other things to note
Ideal for a city trip to Antwerp or a base for your work (Nearby the Port of Antwerp).

In short, an absolute top location!

Very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp and the Riverside.

description:
Je komt terecht in een woning waar je je thuis zal voelen, wij wonen hier tenslotte normaal zelf. Door de grote raampartijen valt er enorm veel licht binnen. De woning is nieuw (2020) en voorziet je dus van alle comfort. Er is een ruim zuidwest-terras waar de zon vanaf de middag tot ongeveer 18u op schijnt.

The space
Je komt binnen in de fietsenatelier, hier kan je eventueel een fiets stallen indien nodig. Via deze ruimte komen ook onze vrienden Stijn en Evelyne binnen, zij wonen in de studio op de gelijkvloers. De trap naar de eerste verdieping brengt je naar één grote open ruimte (50m2) met hierin de keuken en leefruimte. Vanaf de keuken kom je ook op het terras (20m2). De open trap vanuit de leefruimte brengt je verder naar de 2e verdieping waar je de slaapkamer, ruime badkamer en apart toilet vindt.

Guest access
Op 50 meter: metrostation (lijn 8 en 9 in 3 minuten naar Antwerpen Centraal Station)

Op 200 meter: bus en tram stat

description:
Bright and beautiful apartment on the most charming square of the city. The location is an experience in itself.
Very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp and the Riverside.
This is known to be the best possible tourist location, surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp with several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area.
The central station is a 15min walk.
The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials.
See you soon! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The whole apartment is available, private & yours.

description:
Van harte welkom in mijn gezellig en modern duplex appartement! Op het gelijkvloerse gedeelte heb ik achteraan een zonnige tuin met terras.

Op het einde van mijn straat kan je steeds tram, bus of Antwerp Velo fiets nemen naar het centrum (15min).

Je kan steeds je wagen voor de deur gratis parkeren op de voorziene parkeerruimte.

The space
Op het gelijkvloerse gedeelte heb ik een ruime keuken met vaatwasser, oven, stoomoven, nespresso machine, inductievuur en microgolfoven.
Aansluitend is er een lichte eetruimte met houten tafel waarbij je zicht hebt op de tuin.

Op de eerste verdieping bevinden zich mijn slaapkamer met kingsize bed en kledingrek, badkamer met toilet, wastafel en bad én een leefruimte met bureau, zetel en TV. Je kan steeds gebruikmaken van gratis WIFI.

In de buurt zijn er winkels, eetgelegenheden, parken en een gratis zwemvijver op wandelafstand!

description:
Dit smaakvol ingericht achterhuisje ligt op een rustige kleine patio middenin de bruisende modebuurt van Antwerpen op 100m van het Modemuseum. Het oude centrum, het winkelgebied en het bruisende Zuid zijn allemaal op een paar stappen verwijderd. Op het gelijkvloers vind je een slaapkamer met dubbel bed, voldoende kastruimte en een badkamer met douche en toilet. Met het trapje naar boven vind je op de 1e verdieping een ingerichte keuken, eettafel en leefruimte. Parking mogelijk op verzoek.

Guest access
Tal van openbare parkeermogelijkheden in de buurt

Other things to note
Babybed kan worden voorzien. Niet toegankelijk voor rolstoelgebruikers of mensen die moeilijk te been zijn omwille van trap. Niet geschikt voor kinderen, omwille van stijle trap.

description:
BnB Antwerpen, welkom in het historische hart van de stad.

De Reyndersstraat ligt midden in het historisch centrum van Antwerpen.
De Groenplaats bevindt zich om de hoek!
Aan het einde van de straat vind je de kaaien en de Schelde.
De Grote Markt en de kathedraal van Antwerpen liggen op 350 meter afstand van het appartement.
De Meir (de langste winkelstraat van Antwerpen) ligt op zo'n 250 meter afstand.

Ons appartement is op de tweede verdieping, te bereiken per trap.

The space
Een heerlijk rustpunt, in een bruisende stad.

Het appartement is gelegen op de kruising van de Reyndersstraat en Leeuwenstraat.
Het pand is in 2017 volledig gerenoveerd en voldoet aan alle eisen van nu.

Midden in het historische centrum, met alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand. Toch is het rustig en stil, overal dubbel glas en goed geïsoleerd.

Verder een natuurlijke flow naar de leefruimte, woonkamer met keuken(eiland), ensuite slaapkamer en terras. The space
Een loft gevoel met open concept met diverse design meubelen en items. Verder een rustige ensuite slaapkamer met vintage schuifdeuren. Geniet in de zomer van het terras achteraan of voel je even Romeo & Juliette op het balkon vooraan! Welkom. ;)

description:
Bright, beautiful and unique apartment, very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp. This is known to be the best possible tourist location.

You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area.

The central station is a 15min walk. The riverside is a 5min walk.

The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials.

Hopefully we'll see you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The whole apartment is available, private & yours.

The house is located near “Groen kwartier” one of the trendiest neighbourhoods in Antwerp, lot’s nice pubs, coffee houses and restaurants.
Located 3 Km from the city centre, 10 minutes bike (free bikes available).

The space
The - exclusively for guests - modern bedroom, sitting room and bathroom are located on the 3rd floor, accessible via a spacious staircase, the guest toilet is located on the mezzanine.

Guest access
Parking is usually possible in front of the house, parking rate is 5€/day or 25€/week.

Berchem train station at 1 km, easily accessible by public

The bed is installed there for a wonderfully quiet night. If you are easily warm at night, tilt the window next to the bed.
Fast WiFi is available everywhere (300 Mbps).

Het appartement is volledig open. Binnen betreed je eerst de open keuken, met eetgedeelte en ernaast de gezellige zithoek met tv en uitzicht op de stad. Er is slaapplaats voor 2 personen in de living. Aan de andere kan van de keuken vind je het toilet en bergruimte en als je doorwandeld kom je in de ruime slaapkamer met dubbel bed en aangrenzend een zonnig terras met zithoek. Aan de slaapkamer heb je ook een badkamer met open douche en grote lavabo en spiegel. Het is zo ingericht dat je helemaal tot rust kan komen in de drukke stad.

description:

Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere that is Happert House: a place where life is always fantastic!

Whether it be in the spacious courtyard or one of the many beautifully appointed rooms by an open fireplace, there are several places where people can relax and sit quietly together.

This luxurious, welcoming and stylish setting is ideally suited to virtually any form of meeting, event or workshop. Happert House can easily accommodate up to 12 guests.

description:
Leuke woning op een zucht van het populaire Te Boelaerpark, met Café Josée, bar Brul en wijnbars achter de hoek. In 10 minuutjes ben je met de tram in het centrum van Antwerpen.

De woning is volledig gerenoveerd en heeft een prachtige tuin met een leuk terras. De living is heel groot en heeft een moderne keuken. Niet beschikbaar voor groep jongeren. Er zijn fietsen te beschikking (3) + kinderfietsen.

description:
The Inbetween is een junior suite van The Old Beech, een Luxueuze Bed & Breakfast in de meest gegeerde wijk van Antwerpen, gedecoreerd in Neo-Lodewijk-XVI-stijl, met onze eigen draai eraan natuurlijk.

The space
The Inbetween is een junior suite met aparte badkamer, voorzien van dubbele lavabo, inloopdouche en toilet. De kamer met zicht op de tuin en onze oude beuk, is getypeerd door haar natuurlijke hout en grijs tinten, een oase van rust. Niet teveel rust weliswaar, want doorheen de ruimte blaast een frisse bries van turquoise. Zoals al onze kamers is ook deze voorzien van een groot comfortabel bed opgemaakt in dons (of microvezel op aanvraag), Grote smart-tv met streaming mogelijkheden, Koffie en thee-faciliteiten, gratis minibar, ruim bureau en zithoek. Verder zijn er ook super zachte handdoeken, badjassen en slippers. Zeep, shampoo, conditioner en lotion zijn eveneens aanwezig.

The Sweet is een suite met apart salon en badkamer, voorzien van dubbele lavabo, inloopdouche, vrijstaand bad en toilet. De kamer met klein balkon, kijkt uit over de Van Putlei. Zoals al onze kamers is ook deze voorzien van een groot comfortabel bed opgemaakt in dons (of microvezel op aanvraag), Grote smart-tv met streaming mogelijkheden, Koffie en thee-faciliteiten, gratis minibar, ruim bureau en zithoek. Verder zijn er ook super zachte handdoeken, badjassen en slippers. Zeep, shampoo, conditioner en lotion zijn eveneens aanwezig.

Bathroom is shared with another Airbnb guest.

Two spacious bedrooms and two full bathrooms, one of which is adjacent to the bedroom.

In the large, airy living space you can relax after a busy working day.
Plenty of daylight flowing in, in the middle of the historic city center: a dream of many! Ideal place for city-lovers who need sufficient space to move around.

Other things to note
Unfortunately there is no free parking

description:
The apartment has a unique roof terrace of 70m2 with old apple and pear trees. It's located in the trendy area that called 'the south' . There are many nice restaurants and cafes . Free parking is available around the corner. Public transport is in front of the door. The kitchen is fully equipped with all the basics. Free coffee and tea are also offered. PLEASE NOTE: for long stays, the price is without heating (gas). This will be settled at the end of the stay.

The space

The spacious 2-bedroom duplex (120sqm) is located in the Riverside Tower (1972), an architectural gem designed by renowned architects Léon Stynen and Paul De Meyer.
It offers fantastic views over the river Scheldt and the city of Antwerp on one side, and the park and harbour on the other side. The flat is in a green, residential area with a supermarket and bakery nearby.
The city centre is 2,5 km away and easy to reach on foot, by bike, boat, bus or tram. Public on-street parking is free.

The space
When you enter the duplex you are immediately struck by the double-height living room/ dining room with unique views over the park and the harbour.
The orientation is West so you get to enjoy stunning sunsets.
The kitchen is original but with new appliances. For those who like to eat out, there's a nice variety of local restaurants.
Upstairs you find two comfortable bedrooms, 1 double and 2 singles, with views over the river and the city

One of the best possible tourist locations. All Antwerp high-lights are on a walking distance. You can experience our amazing city by visiting the Cathedral, River-Side, MAS museum and famous shopping street Meir by foot!

The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

description:
This cosy rooftop apartment has been fully renovated to gain the most out of its surface and views. A combination of bio-based materials such as clay plaster and tadelakt were used with existing elements and new high-end finishing.

The open floor plan emphasises a luxury shower and a fully equipped kitchen. A hidden sliding door separates the living area from the bedroom if desired.

A buffet piano and a large South-oriented terrace are the cherry to top this apartment!

description: Очень комфортное однокомнатное жильё в центре г. Антверпен. Отдельное, тихое, уютное и стильное жильё со своей кухней, душевой, бесплатным WiFi, холодильником и многое другое. В здании имеется стиральная машина и сушилка (бесплатно). Рядом находится станция метро Zegel, что позволяет в течение 5-ти минут добраться до центра города и центрального вокзала. На нашей улице много мест для бесплатной парковки (парковаться нужно днём, вечером мест практически нет).

description:
Welcome tot the Salmgang Suite!
Behind a renovated façade, you will find the unique alley "Salmgang", which gives out onto recently renovated workers' houses from the 19th century. A piece of Antwerp's cultural heritage and therefore the perfect location to discover this beautiful city. In this unique, small house you will find all the luxury and comfort of a hotel combined with the cosiness and privacy of home.
All museums, attractions, terraces and restaurants are within walking distance.

The space
We offer you a cosy living room with fully equipped kitchen on the ground floor, a bathroom with dressing on the first floor and a wonderful bed to sleep in on the top floor.
All you have to do is unpack your suitcases and your holiday can begin!

This will help us provide you with the best experience!

description:
In de kleurrijke en levendige buurt van Borgerhout, vind je hier toch alle rust. Het appartement is aan de achterkant gelegen, dus je hebt geen last van straatlawaai. Het is geen groot appartement, maar het is met veel liefde ingericht. Het grote terras geeft ook een extra gevoel van ruimte en is ideaal voor een ochtendyoga sessie of een gezellige barbecue!

The space
Het appartement is ongeveer 55m2. Je komt meteen binnen in de leefruimte, waar ook de bureau staat. Daarnaast is er een open keuken met alle voorzieningen. In de gang naast de leefruimte vind je aansluitend de badkamer met wasmachine. Ook aan deze gang ligt de kamer. Deze is ruim genoeg. Er staat een dubbel bed in. Het bed is een twijfelaar, wat extra gezellig is voor koppels :). Ook in de slaapkamer vind je een klein bureautje.

Right next to the Opera of Antwerp and a few minutes from the Central Station. We are on the corner of the famous shopping street "the Meir". The most renowned shopping street of Belgium.

The Grote Markt and riverside are 10 minute walk. Our apartments has the ideal location for city-trips, holidays and business trips. We have strong WiFi and a brand new and fully equipped kitchen.

Hope to host you soon! Cheers! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access

description:
Dit gezellige en zonnige appartement is compact én ruim tegelijk.
Vanuit de keuken en slaapkamer is er zicht over een parkje met veel groen en bomen. 's Avonds na 18 uur sluiten de poorten van dit park.
Gelegen op wandelafstand van het station [600 m] en het centrum [1 km van de Meir, 1,5 km van de Groenplaats en Grote Markt]. Park Spoor Noord, een open en ruim park met speelwater en fonteinen en zomerbar ligt op 1 km wandelen.
Ook het Eilandje en het MAS liggen op maar 1,5 km.

The space
Dit zonnig appartement ligt op de 3de verdieping van een kleine blok van 3. Onder het appartement woont er 1 buurvrouw. Op de 1ste verdieping worden workshops rond koffie gegeven. Er is geen lift in het gebouw.

Guest access

description:
Dit huis is gelegen in hartje Hoboken, aan de zuidrand van Antwerpen, speelpleinen, parken en natuurgebied Hoboken polder nabij. Ideaal voor een gezin, er is een ruime tuin met voldoende schaduw en zon, en in het huis vind je speelgoed en veel ruimte. Op enkele minuten wandelen zijn er tram en bushaltes waardoor je 20 minuten later in het centrum van Antwerpen vertoeft. Op 15 minuten wandelen vind je trein station Hoboken polder - en op amper 13 minuten treinen sta je op het Centraal station.

The space
je komt binnen in de ruime inkom. op de benedenverdieping vindt je een grote woonkamer met speelhoek en L zetel plus grote tv. verder ook een gezellige leefkeuken met eethoek. er is nog een bijkeuken/ wasplaats met wasmachine, droogkast, en de kattenbakken. vanuit de keuken ga je via glazen schuifdeur naar de tuin met zit gelegenheden en achterin een moestuin.

description:
Charming and luxurious room in a 500-year old master's house. Freshly renovated and sound isolated.
Design bathroom, extra large rain shower and private toilet.
Beautiful Oak floors everywhere for an extra cosy touch.
Hotel quality boxspring beds where you wake up with a view on Antwerp's famous cathedral, which is at only 5 minutes walking.
Kitchenette with a fridge and microwave to have a fresh drink or prepare breakfast.

Unique historic room in the absolute heart of Antwerp. Come enjoy it!

Other things to note
Very easy self check-in every time you like as from 15h with electronic locks and self check-in codes (codes are sent to you the night before your arrival).

description:
Welcome! Me and my partner rent out the 2nd bedroom on our 8th floor apartment.

The room has space for 2 guests: one in a single bed, and one on an air matrass.

The building is located close to public transport: you can find a bike sharing station right in front, and Central Station as well as Berchem station are 15 mins. walk away.

We already share our apartment with a cat, so be careful if you have allergies! Smoking is possible on the balcony or at the open window in the room.

The space
The room overlooks Borgerhout and the north of Antwerp. There is a single bed with bedside table with a lamp and drawers that you can use. You can work at the desk: there is a screen, WiFi, a speaker and some office materials in the drawer and the cupboard, in which you can also store your personal equipment. In the dresser with mirror we provide 2 large drawers for your use.

description:
Stylish apartment with an amazing view of the city and the sunrise.

Right next to the Opera of Antwerp and a few minutes from the Central Station. We are on the corner of the famous shopping street "the Meir", the most renowned shopping street of Belgium.

The Grote Markt and Riverside are a 10 minute walk. Our apartments has the ideal location for city-trips, holidays and business trips. We provide WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for all guests.

See you soon! :-)

Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home.

description:
Spacious 19th century apartment near Antwerp city perfect for travelers on vacation/business. A 5mins walk to Antwerpen-Berchem Station w/major connecting Tram/Bus lines will take you to Main Square (Grote Markt), Shopping Street (Meir), Airport, Intercity Trains or anywhere!

-Fast WiFi
-2 Velo Bike Stations
-55" TV with 4K Netflix/Amazon Prime/4K Chromecast
-Nespresso Machine/Tea
-Extendable Lounge Sofa
-Dryer/Washing Machine
-Shampoo/Soap/Linen/Towels

The space
Bedroom 1: Large Double Bed (160cm)
Bedroom 2: Small Double Bed (120cm)
Common areas: Living room has two sofas that unfolds to a double bed (140cm). One sofa also reclines to a lounge chair.

Entire apartment

description:
Deze gezellige duplex ligt op de heerlijke Vrijdagmarkt midden in het historische centrum. Alle hippe bars en restaurants zijn op wandelafstand alsook de meeste musea.
Leuk en kleurrijk ingericht met zicht op het plein en de prachtige toren van de kathedraal
De living voorzien met tv en bibliotheek met allerhande boeken over Antwerpen/België.
Er is een bureau voorzien om te werken. Droger en wasmachine. Badkamer met bad/douche. Volledig uitgeruste keuken.

description:
Apartment in the heart of Sint-Andries; the fashion district in the center of Antwerp.
Above "Antoine", where you drink the finest coffee in Antwerp, you will find two cozy floors in a 'bel-epoque' house from the nineteenth century. The apartment is fully renovated, comfortable and wonderfully light and high.

The space
The space is high and light. The three tall windows overlook St. Anthonius Street and Kammer Street. All the rooms are decorated with design. In the bookcase you'll find books about art and Antwerp.

On the second floor a spacious living room with open kitchen, kitchenette, dining table and sitting area with comfortable sofa. On the third floor - in the hood - two bright bedrooms, bathroom and a separate WC. A small landing gives access to these rooms. The large bedroom has a double bed, the smaller one two single beds which can also be joined together to make one bed.

Dit gezellig en charmant appartement in een bruisende buurt, gelegen op de 1ste verdieping, is de perfecte plek om om Antwerpen te verkennen. Het ligt op loopafstand van het historisch centrum, 'het Eilandje en het MAS', winkelstraat 'de Meir', centraal station, tal van restaurants en bars...

Het appartement heeft alles wat je nodig hebt: keuken (oven, koffieapparatuur, etc), mooie slaapkamer met dubbel bed en badkamer met douche en toilet.

Ik kijk ernaar uit om je te mogen verwelkomen! :)

description:
Welcome to Hotel Flora, located in the heart of the historic city center of Antwerp. Through a private aisle you enter an exceptional 15th century merchant's house transformed into a unique boutique hotel with 7 rooms. Allow yourself to disengage even further from reality by luxurious designs and the artistic interventions in your room Ruby.

The space
Hotel Flora is an exceptional jewel from the past, featuring an original Rococo gatehouse, a Chinese pagoda and authentic ornaments. To create a connection with the here and now, an evanescent, dynamic and playful, yet elegant atmosphere was chosen. A synergy that can be found in the world of Gert Voorjans, 'breaking all the rules', but always refined.

description:
The penthouse is located within 5 minutes walk away from the centre of the city in a perfect location to explore all of the wonderful attractions Antwerp has to offer: restaurants, cafés, bakeries, fashion boutiques and musea all within walking distance. It is a 2 km (30 minutes) walk from the Central Station but also close to bus and tram stops.

The space
A spacious living room with a sofa bed suitable for two persons.
The bedroom contains a hypercomfortable king size boxspring bed ( pictures available as of 25/09/2022).
A bathroom with shower and sink are available as well as a toilet (separate from the bathroom).
The terrace is 10 square meters and perfect for breakfast or a glass of wine in complete privacy.
It is located on the 4th floor in a building with no elevator.

Other things to note
The penthouse is on the top (4th) floor of a newly renovated building that has no elevator.

description:
Prachtig, lichtrijk en groen, nieuw gerenoveerd gelijkvloers appartement in historisch herenhuis. Long stay only.

The space
Aansluitend aan de koewr achteraan zijn twee slaapkamers met grote ramen. 1 slaapkamer is aansluitend aan de badkamer. De andere slaapkamer is loft gewijs aangesloten met hoge stalen ramen met de leefruimte. Voor de privacy afsluitbaar met gordijnen. De leef en eetruimte zijn volledig nieuw uitgerust. De historische vloer aangevuld met eiken parket zorgen voor de warme en historische charme. Heel lichtrijk appartement grenzend aan de straat met veel groen op de gevel. Alle bedden zijn van elkaar (licht) verwijderbaar.

Other things to note
De tweede slaapkamer is enkel afgesloten met hoge stalen ramen van de leefruimte, er is geen vaste muur of volle deur tussen slaapkamer en rest van het appartement.

description:
Moderne studio met mezzanine in het centrum van Antwerpen!

Mijn lichtrijke studio is gelegen op de derde en hoogste verdieping in een van de gezelligste straten van Antwerpen, op een boogscheut van de Grote Markt.

Uitzicht op de kathedraal. Tal van bars, restaurants, winkels en toeristische trekpleisters op wandelafstand.

The space
De studio is gelegen op de derde verdieping (let op! Geen lift aanwezig!). De ruimte is compact, maar gerieflijk ingericht. Er is een leefruimte met grote zetel en een compacte open keuken met eethoek. In de badkamer zijn een wc, wastafel en douche aanwezig. Via een houten ladder klim je tot net onder het dak, waar een groot tweepersoonsbed staat.

Other things to note
Belangrijk! De studio is niet geschikt voor kleine kinderen en mensen die slecht te been zijn omwille van de steile trap & de ladder naar de mezzanine.

De studio ligt in een autoluwe straat. Hierdoor is het helaas

description:
Hi
I'm Mahmoud
I'm a Painter
For 2 years I'm living in Antwerp and I feel so good! :))

My apartment is in the neighbourhood named Borgherhout, 15 minutes from the central station by tram, bus or metro and 25minutes by walk. The apartment is inside a 100 years old amazing Belgian townhouse on the third floor, with wooden floors and stairs, really cool and Wabi Sabi!
There is a living room, bedroom, bathroom and kitchen.

The space
The apartment consists of two part; there is a spacious living room with a lot of daylight, and a large bedroom.
The second part contains a kitchen with all the necessary utensils and a bathroom with a nice view and a really beautiful original tile floor!
If you would like to use a washing machine, you can use the one from my amazing philosopher neighbour Sofie on the ground floor.

There is good Wi-Fi!

I like to keep my house simple and minimal; less is more.
